choices: He runs across a gypsy in distress.
1.content:
Josh was having a rough day. He left his paper on the start of World War I on his desk and now he had to listen to his teacher talk to him about the responsibility he needed to have. "Honestly, I did it Mr. Jackson. I just left it on my desk when I was running out the door this morning." Josh apologized to his History teacher. "Will it be alright if I hand it in first thing on Monday?" He looked at his middle-aged teacher with the best puppy dog eyes that even his sister, Bri, would be proud of.

Mr. Daniel Jackson brushed his hand through his bristly mustache that he loved. His wife didn't really care for it too much, but he really wanted to try something new. He thought about the offer that Josh gave him. "I don't see the problem in it." Josh celebrated silently and was caught by Mr. Jackson fist pumping the air. "But only if you bring it to me before the start of school on Monday. When the bell rings for 1st period and you're not here." He drew an imaginary 'X' with his fingers. "You will receive an incomplete."

"Mr. Jackson, you have nothing to worry about. It will be here on your desk." Josh replied as he pointed to the cluttered heap of papers. He smiled as he turned toward the door and left. Since it was his last period of the day, he went over to his locker and went through it's contents. 'I really need to clean this out.' He thought to himself, seeing something at the bottom of the locker from the second week of school.

"So what are you up to tonight, Joshie?" A feminine voice called out to him from behind and his heart did a leap. For the past year, he'd been trying to get out of friend zone with her, but had little luck so far. Josh turned around to see his good friend Jennifer walking closer to him. "I was thinking that we could study for that Biology test that's next week."

"Geeze, Jen." Josh sighed as he slung his backpack over his shoulder and closed his locker door. "You're always wanting to study, besides we can do that next week and plus you can come later on so that we can watch the new movie that I got?"

Jennifer brought her hand up to get the hair that was on her face and brought it behind her ear and sighed. "I guess we can do that." She answered as she glanced at her watch. "Oh crap." She exclaimed as she brought the watch over to Josh's eyes. "If you don't hurry up then you're going to miss the bus."

He looked at the watch on her wrist and gasped. "Crap, I need to hurry." He waved her good-bye as he quickly made his way outside to catch his bus. He opened the doors leading to the area where the buses sat in a hurry, but only to see his bus driving away without him. He groaned as he cursed the higher power that was in charge of ruining his life. "I guess I better start walking." He sighed. "I wonder how this day could get any worse?" He grimaced loudly as he felt the first drop hit his forehead and instantly knew what kind of day it was going to be. The rain soon began to pick up at a steady rate and Josh was certainly glad that his overprotective mom made sure that he had the umbrella. "My umbrella!" Josh yelled as he checked his backpack and soon found the item in his pack that would make his walk home much more enjoyable. He got it out and opened it just as the rain started to fall at a quicker rate. Josh couldn't help but smile as he walked down the sidewalk under the broad protection of his umbrella.
1.title: The beginning...

choices: Courtney stops by to see why he was late getting home.
Bri wants some help with her homework.
Josh's mom wonders why he was wet and late coming home.
11.content:
The rain continued to fall at a significant rate with no appearance of quitting any time soon. The constant pitter patter of the rain was only interrupted by the couple of cars that drove by. But Josh walked on and soon found he was near a bus stop. "Too bad I don't have a bus pass." He muttered to himself as he took refuge from the constant barrage of the rain in the empty, enclosed stop. He furled up his umbrella and sat down in the enclosure. Back a few years back, the city started to put on these plexiglass enclosures up after much of the community complained about the long waits for the public transportation and having to do so with the constantly changing weather. 'At least, I can take a small break.' Josh thought to himself as he heard a squeaking sound. The sound reminded him of the horrible carts at the big-box store Wal-Mart.

"Is this seat taken?" A gravely voice asked as Josh turned to see an older woman pushing a well worn walker. Her hair looked like she had just got out of the shower and her clothes were sopping wet too. Josh got up and offered her the seat. He gazed out the opening, almost as if he was entranced by the white noise that the rain caused. "It's really coming down today, isn't it?" The older lady asked him, which caused him to shake his head and come back to reality.

He nodded his head. "Yeah, it certainly is." Josh replied back to her. "It's almost like it came out of nowhere."

"Yes and I can certainly feel it in my old bones." The older lady said back to him. Josh looked over and noticed that she seemed to be wringing her hands trying to alleviate some of the pain that the years of hard work caused in her hands.

"I have some aspirin." Josh announced as he began to rummage through his pack to find the elusive treasure. He found it laying at the bottom of his pack and offered the well used bottle. Even though students weren't allowed to bring medication to school without a doctor's prescription. But as they always say, 'What they don't know can't hurt them.'

"Aren't you sweet." The elderly lady responded back to him as she took the almost empty bottle and took out several of the round pills. She popped them into her mouth and proceeded to swallow them without the need of refreshment. Handing the bottle back over to Josh, she noticed the look of wonder on his face. "Oh, as you get older you certainly get used to taking medication." She chuckled as she began to get back up. "I think I've doddled here long enough." Josh, with his years in community service projects, quickly made his way over to her and assisted her. "Why thank you young man."

"How much farther do you have to walk?" Josh inquired as he stepped back to allow her the exit.

"Oh, I think I have a mile left." The older lady answered back to him with a smile on her face, it was almost like it was no big deal. "The bus system doesn't go anywhere near my house, unfortunately."

Josh looked down at his umbrella and back at the drenched elderly lady. After feeling sympathy for her, he offered her his only protection from the deluge coming out of the sky. "Here, I think you will need this more than I do." He replied as held out the umbrella.

Awestruck, the older lady graciously accepted the item that would increase her protection from the rain. "But won't you get wet?" She asked.

"Yeah, but I live just 2 blocks that way." He answered as he gestured further down the road.

"Well, you're going to give me this gift." She started to say as she began to look through her bag draped around her walker.

"Oh, you don't have to." He began to say but soon found a handful of dust being blown into his face and started a coughing fit.

"You have given me this gift and I will give this gift. You will be able to experience the way others live, but only with their permission." She replied with a smile as she began to turn.

"Wait..." Josh called out to her. "What do you mean experience?"

"Oh, I mean that you will be able to swap traits with another person, but only with their permission." She replied back to him.

"Did you really have to blow that stuff into my face?" He wondered as he turned to gather up his items. Not hearing anything, Josh turned back around to the older lady and noticed that she was nowhere to be found. Looking up and down the street in hopes to find his gracious gift giver, but only found the occasional stray animal wandering the rain soaked streets. "What the..." He shook his head in disbelief. "Well, I guess I better get back to getting home before Courtney and Bri worry." With the rain coming down and no umbrella to be found, Josh found he made better time. Several minutes later, Josh found his way back to the home and in the bathroom to dry off and put on some dry clothes. Having found some drier clothing, he made his way to his room to see about getting his homework done.
11.title: He runs across a gypsy in distress.

111.content:
Josh continued in his attempt to dry off and getting into some drier clothing before his overprotective mother caught him. He quickly found a blue, 'retro' looking 'School House Rock' T-shirt and slipped it over his head. Just in time too, because just then he heard a light rapping on his door. "Yeah?" He called out to the mysterious visitor behind the doorway. The door creaked open and in walked his younger sister, Courtney, carrying her clothes under her arm so that she can put them away in her room. "Hey there Courtney, what's going on?" He asked as he picked up the drenched shirt and tossed it into the hamper across the room. As he watched it go in the hamper, he chuckled as he remembered back to his Middle School basketball days.

"Why are you so wet?" She asked him as she eyed both him and the shirt that he recently tossed into the hamper. "What happened to your umbrella?"

"You probably wouldn't believe me if I told you." Josh sighed as he motioned her to his used office chair next to his desk. "Do you need help with something?" Courtney nodded and caused her strawberry blonde hair to fall into her eyes.

"No, I was just putting my clothes away before I get grounded again." She replied with a sigh as she grabbed the rogue pieces of hair and brought them back behind her ear in an attempt to bring them back under her control. Courtney then placed the clothing on his bed and groaned as she watched them fall over, coming unfolded in the process. "I hope you don't mind if I lay them here?"

"Oh, not at all." Josh chuckled as he lay down on his bed next to her clothing.

"So, what happened to you today after you missed the bus?" Courtney wondered as she started to refold her clothes, taking care to make them the way that their Mom loves so much.

Josh knew he couldn't keep it to himself forever so he told her the story. How the rain seemed to come down in sheets, how he met up with the older lady that had the creaky walker, and how she gave him the 'gift'. "That's about it." Josh replied as he sighed in relief and attempted to regain his breathing after spilling out the entire story with a single breath.

"So you don't really believe in that mumbo jumbo, do you?" Courtney laughed as she thought about magic. She had always been much more down to earth than her other siblings and didn't really believe in magic.

"Well, I haven't really had a chance to think about it, honestly." Josh said as he looked at the hamper that he tossed his clothes earlier.

Courtney looked down at her clothes grimaced at the amount of clothing she had accumulated over the years. Just as she did, her hair began to fall into her face once more. "I wish that this hair would just stay where it supposed to be." She grumbled as she brought it back behind her ear.

"Well, I would certainly take it off of your hands if I could." Josh said to her reassuringly as he gently patted her on her back to emphasize the point.

"And I would gladly give it to you." She chuckled as the both closed their eyes because of a blinding light filled the room. "What happened?" Courtney asked as she brought her hands up to her head to relieve a scratch. What happened next would make her believe in magic. Her once strawberry blonde hair had turned into short, cropped hairstyle a boy would wear. "My hair!" She responded as she looked over at her brother who seemed to be having the same problem.

"Why do you have my hair and I have yours?" Josh wondered as he tried in vain to get his new mane of hair under control.

"I don't know?" She replied as she continued to feel her hair. "You just said that you would take it off my hands if you could."

"And then the flash of light happened." Josh interrupted as he played the story out in his head. His new hair started to get in his eyes once more and he grew more aggravated with it. Taking it firmly in his hands, Josh balled it up and threw it behind him.

"You can't do that." Courtney said angrily as she made her way over to him. "You're going to get it all knotted up. Maybe if we redo what happened, we can get out hair back." She suggested.

"I guess that could work." Josh agreed as he patted the bed right next to him so that she could sit down too. "I would gladly take it off of your hands if I could." Josh announced and closed his eyes as he anticipated the blinding light. After now seeing the light, he reopened his eyes. "What happened? Why didn't it work like it was supposed to?"

Courtney sat there for a moment and thought about it. "Oh..." She squealed with delight. "And I would give it to you." The blinding light came back once more and after the two of them were able to come back to their senses, they brought their hands up to their heads to feel their hair. "I'm back to normal." Courtney said happily as she bounced up and down on the bed.

"Me too." Josh replied back to her and sighed in relief.

"I guess that lady did give you something." Courtney said to her brother. "I guess we both have to agree for it to work." Josh sat there for a moment to think about what had just transpired. "But I do have something to ask of you." She then turned to her brother and looked in his eyes. "I have something that I have to do tomorrow morning, but I have to meet up with Christina to go clothes shopping. So I was wondering if I could borrow your friends so that I won't have to choose which one to do."

"I guess I can." Josh answered back to her. "How long will I need to keep it for?"

"Just until until bedtime tomorrow?" She suggested. "So will you swap friends with me until tomorrow?"

"I guess we can do that." Josh replied tentatively, but that seemed to be good enough for his new found power to work and the blinding light soon enveloped the two of them once again. "I don't feel any different." He said to his sister but soon found her looking at his computer and noticed all of his friends replaced hers on his Facebook account.

"Thanks." Courtney chuckled as she looked at her brother who had a grim look on his face. "Oh it's alright. I mean, it's not like you're going to my beauty pageant..."

Josh's eyes grew 2 sizes when he heard this. "No, that is one thing I'm not going to do." He replied as he brought his hands up to protect himself from the thought of having to parade himself in front of the crowd.

"It's not that bad, but we can certainly trade some other stuff and I'm sure you've always wanted to see what its like to be a girl." She suggested to him. "It might even get you a girlfriend."

"No, I'm perfectly happy being a guy and I'm just not ready to have a girlfriend yet." He announced as he folded his hands across his chest.

"Right..." She said smiling as she began to bait him into something. "I bet you're too scared to make another swap."

"I'm not scared." Josh announced proudly. "I'm sure I could handle almost anything that you would suggest." He stuck out his chest to show his bravery.

"Okay." Courtney replied back to him. "How about we swap _________ and you can prove it to me."
111.title: Courtney stops by to see why he was late gettin...

choices: Josh looks in his closet to see his new wardrobe.
Courtney comes back in and begs for another swap.
Josh checks out his new predicament.
1111.content:
"Okay." Courtney replied back to him. "How about we swap our clothing and you can prove it to me. Besides, I think you would look cute wearing my clothes and that way you know what kind of clothing I like to wear." Josh looked at her with a sense of disdain. He really didn't want to wear skirts until tomorrow. "Well, do we have a deal or do you want to swap something else like height." She couldn't help but grin as she saw Josh's reaction of horror.

Just as fast as the reaction came to him, it dissolved, but only when he realized that he needed the permission from him and the person that he was swapping with for it to take place. "I don't know if I want that or not." He declared proudly. "Heck, I don't know if I want to swap anything else with you."

Courtney looked at him and crossed her arms in disdain, she didn't realize that both people needed to agree to swap in order for it to happen. As she thought about this, a little light bulb went off within her head. "That's fine. I could use a break from my friends, but what will I do about Kira's sleep over next weekend? I mean, you will be over at that girl you like's house.." She feigned a thinking pose as she brought her finger up to her mouth to emphasize the effect. Something that she saw on one of her favorite shows. Just as expected, her brother didn't seem to know what she was doing.

"You wouldn't dare." He glared as he took out his phone and noticed all of his contacts were indeed all of his sister friends. Plus, with her being such the social butterfly, there were quite a few numbers.

"Try me." Courtney replied back to him. "So do you agree to swap clothing with me or will you be going to the sleepover next weekend?" She cocked her hip slightly.

"Fine." Josh growled, but soon was blinded by the light once more. As it subsided and he was able to see again, he felt a slight constriction on his chest and around his hips. He opened his eyes and noticed that he also had her booty shorts and light pink tank top on his body. But it all seemed to fit him. He also noticed the clothes that she brought in and found that they also swapped to be his male clothing.

"Hmm..." Courtney said seemingly unfazed by what had just happened. "I thought these clothes that I brought in with me would be yours, but I guess I was wrong." She sighed as she picked up her new clothes and brought them with her to her room, effectively leaving Josh in his misery.

11111.content:
As he lay on his bed waiting for his sister to leave and go back to her room, Josh took a quick look around his room. Everything seemed to stay the same, the posters, the game systerm on his dresser, and the photos of his friends next to it. "Wait a minute." Josh exclaimed as she quickly got up to go over to the photos to get a closer look at it. Instead of his friends Steven and Tyler, he found a couple of girls who seemed to be around Courtney's age. "Looks like they're my friends until tomorrow."

Josh looked down at his clothes and found it a little uncomfortable and demeaning to wear, so he made his way over to the closet to see if he now had something more comfortable and less revealing to wear. As he opened the door, Josh found, much to his dread, filled mostly with skirts and dresses. He reached in and found a pair of jeans and quickly put them on over this shorts. "I am so ready to get this over with." He sighed as he picked up his remote and started to play again.
11111.title: Josh looks in his closet to see his new wardrobe.

choices: Skip to clothes shopping with Jessica...
11112.content:
Josh knew that these swaps he was making with his sister were just temporary (at least he hoped) and he just had to be patient and deal with the swaps he made. He guessed that since Courney and her friend Jessica were going shopping tomorrow morning, he would have to go do it now. At least he would fit in now as he had the clothing style of a 12 year-old girl. Josh decided he would double check with Jessica since he had nothing better to do.

Josh started to type: "Hey Chris! Are we still on for shopping tomorrow morning?"

After a few minutes, he got a response: "Sure thing Joshie! Maybe we can go catch a movie after ;)

"Weird." Josh thought. He looked at previous texts and saw different message exchanged he guessed were between Courtney and Christina. Nothing in the previous messages said anything about movie. You hoped she wasn't hinting at a possible date. "Gross!" Josh said aloud.

---

For about 15 minutes of looking at his phone to see what had been changed, which was quite a lot actually, most of Josh's pictures and videos with him and his friends in it has been replaced with pictures and videos of him with younger girls around Courtney's age.

Just then, Josh heard a knock at the door. "Who is it?" He questioned.

"It's Courtney." She said. Then with a loud whisper, she said "I want to make another swap."

Josh shook his head. "No thanks sis. I'm done for now."

"Please!" She begged. "I'll give you my next week's allowance if you swap."

"Make it two and we'll talk." Josh said, wanting to get the most possible out of this.

Courtney sighed and then agreed, "Fine."

Josh opened the door and let her in, only to close the door again and lock it behind her. "What is it now?"

"It's the mile run." She said. "There's no way I'm gonna pass the time my teacher set for me." Josh remembered the mile run from middle school. The teachers always set unrealistic times for students to achieve even though he normally beat the times due to the fact he was a decent runner.

"What does this have to do with a swap then?" Josh asked his sister.

"Trade our lower halves. With your legs there's no way I WON'T pass."

"No way!" Josh said. There's no way I'm trading my lower body with my sister's. Especially our genitals."

"You can take that part out of the swap. Please do it! Do you really want to see me fail?"

"Okay final offer." Josh said. I'll trade you my lower half minus the genitals, if you give me your next two week's allowance and you let me trade our chores." Josh normally had to take out the trash, bring in logs for a fire at nighttime when it was cold out, and light the fire and make sure it didn't burn out. Courtney on the other hand, only had to wash dishes, and vacuum the house. Josh decided he wanted to trade this because it would take the heavy lifting duties away.

"Ugh... Fine! Deal." Courtney said clearly frustrated. Then there was a flash, and when Josh looked down, his new panties and booty shorts were resized once again as they were now accompanied by shorter, slender, hairless legs and much smaller feet. His hips were now a bit wider as well and his butt grew a bit bigger, but not to huge proportions as Courtney's body was only starting to develop. His toenails on his new feet were painted pink. Josh wore size 9.5 shoes, while Courtney wore 5.5. That was going to be a big adjustment for him. At least he still he his penis. Courtney actually stood a couple of inches taller than Josh now, who now stood at 5 feet while she now stood at 5 feet 2 inches due to her new longer, hairier, muscular legs, and bigger feet.

"Okay." Courtney said with a smile on her face. "I'll trade your legs back after school on Monday."

Josh then realized it was only Friday afternoon. "Wait your keeping my legs and feet for the whole weekend?!?!" Josh asked in worried.

"Well... I need to get used to them before I run don't I?" Courtney reasoned.

"Okay fine." Josh said. "But I'm not swapping our chores back until I get my lower half back."

Before Courtney could say something, their moms voice called out, "Courtney! Come take out the trash for me."

"Okay mom!" Courtney then looked to you. "I'll be back on Monday." She said leaving and closing the door behind her.
11112.title: Courtney comes back in and begs for another swap.

choices: Josh goes shopping with Courtney's friends the next morning
111121.content:
Josh was going at it on his playstation while his mom was preparing dinner, Courtney was doing his chores, and Bri was watching Disney Channel downstairs. After half an hour of preparing the meal, Kim prepared to gather her children for dinner. As the onslaught of zombies on Josh's PlayStation continued, he got a knock on his door from the other side. "Who is it?"

"It's Bri." His youngest sister called from the other side of the door without opening it. "Mom told me to tell you dinner is ready."

"I'll be down in 5."

"Kay kay!" She said, obviously in a good mood. He could hear her skip away down the hall.

When he finished his level, Josh turned the console off and ventured downstairs. He had to be careful to though because he now had the legs of his younger sister attached to a heavier body, he went slow so he didn't lose his balance. "At least I still have my dick though." He thought. As he neared the bottom of the stairs, the front door opened. Behind it was revealed to be his sister Courtney, who was drenched in sweat. "What happened to you? Did you just now take the trash out?" Josh asked.

"No. Apparently you had to water the plants today as well." She said angrily, looking down at him due to her now taller height.

"Oh I forgot about that. Thanks for doing it for me!" Josh snickered, obviously amused by Courtney's misfortune.

"Whatever. Tell mom I'm getting changed and will be down in 5."

He proceeded to enter the kitchen where his mom was dividing the mac and cheese into different bowls, she also added a side of beans along with each serving.

When Josh, Kim and Bri were all finally settled in at the dinner table, the middle Mitchell sibling arrived with a black tee shirt shirt and black sweatpants on. "What took you so long darling?" Kim asked her eldest daughter. Courtney explained how she was running late watering the plants and how she got all sweaty, which forced her to change clothes for dinner. "Fair enough, but we still need those chores done around the house and you know yard work is your job." She said, even though those chores usually belonged to Josh.

Josh thought his sister looked ridiculous with his legs and thought his mom would say something, but she didn't seem to notice the difference. Dinner went by normally for Josh until about halfway through. With his seat at the table, he could see a framed picture of the current for family members and their late husband/father on the wall. What was significant about the picture was that Courtney's legs looked a lot bigger and more masculine in that picture too! Of course the picture was from a couple years ago, which was why Josh's feminine legs even thinner! He could easily tell this because he was wearing one of Courtney's red skirts in the picture that looked ridiculous on him. He couldn't tell why at first, but then he made an educated guess that reality was shifted so it seemed their legs were always like that.

Near the end of dinner, the children reluctant ply ate their beans due to their mother's orders. Beans normally gave Josh gas, but tonight Courtney was the one frequently passing gas! He had to guess that it was because with the lower half swap, she also gained his backside as well, which was causing her to fart. "Courtney, use your manners!" Kim scolded.

"Sorry!" She said more and more surprised each time, not knowing why she was farting so much.

Josh was also farting to a certain extent, but they were very quiet and hardly noticeable. This also helped him figure out why his butt felt a bit 'fatter' than normal. His sister's ass wasn't huge yet, but it was a bit bigger than his.

Finally when dinner ended, their got up and asked her youngest daughter a question. "Are you ready to go sweetie?"

"Yes I am!"

"Where are you going?" Kim's other daughter asked.

"We are going to pick up some supplies for Bri's game tomorrow. We'll be back in 15 minutes, so be good!" She grabbed her keys and opened the door before calling out one last thing. "Don't forget to clean the table and wash the dishes, Josh!"

Courtney noticed the confused look on her brothers face and explained to him. "Cleaning the table and washing the dishes is one of your new chores."

Josh have a nod before Courtney went on to complain about their mom. "Why was mom so mad at me for farting? I don't even know how I was doing it, but they just kept coming."

"I know why." Josh said smiling.

"What was it?"

"It was because when we switched lower halves, you gained my backside too, and I fart more than you do." Josh explained, which eventually caused him to laugh at a frowning Courtney.

"Anyway..." She said. "Mom didn't seem to notice our legs either."

"I think I know why about that too."

"Okay Mr. Know-it-all, tell me." Courtney said annoyed. He then showed his sister the difference in the family photo and explained to her his theory of how his swaps caused reality to change.

"That's actually really cool!" She said. "In that case, why don't we swap our hair color!" She said. "There's always this one idiot guy who calls me a ginger at school even though I'm a strawberry blonde, I want to see what he does if I have your brown hair color."

Josh thought against it at first, but then realized that the worst-case scenario on this swap was minor, and it could protect him from future swaps with his younger sister for the time being if he played his cards right. "I'll only do it if there are no more swaps until I get my friends, lower half, hair color, and clothes back. I want my friends back tomorrow night, and I want the rest back on Monday after school or Monday night."

"How about this: I'll give your friends back tomorrow night like we planned. Then, we can make more swaps after I give you those first three things back you mentioned, and I can keep your clothes for a little longer, but we can only make one more swap after that until I give your clothes back. This way, I can't take too many things from you at once until we swap everything back eventually." She proposed. "Besides, with our hair color we will have 4 different things swapped.

Figuring that was the best deal he was going to get from Courtney given her manipulative nature, he agreed. "Deal, I agree to swap hair color with you." The flash of light returned and disappeared again within a second. When Josh could see again, his sister now had hair that looked similar to Bri's but shorter.

"Let's check this in the bathroom mirror!" His sister said. When they got there, they turned the light on and saw that they didn't looked that much different. They had the same hairstyles but Josh now had light-colored hair that was a reddish color, while Courtney first saw her new look as a brunette. "This is awesome! Thanks LITTLE bro!" She said referring to herself being taller than her older brother now.

After she went upstairs, Josh cleaned the table and went to work in the dishes after. "This is going to be a long weekend." He thought.
111121.title: Dinner time

choices: but his mom calls everyone down for dinner and invites Jenn to eat with them.
and gets on PlayStation to play some video games.
11113.content:
Josh closed the door after Courtney left, as he didn't want anyone else walking in because he wanted to be alone for a few minutes. He didn't want anyone else finding out about his power either for the time being. Josh felt like going on his laptop and what he saw when he opened it shocked him. Instead of his background picture being of him with his close friends at a professional basketball game, it was replaced with a picture of him and some girls who looked to be Courtney's age at the beach. Also, instead of the swim shorts, that he would normally wear, he was wearing a pink two-piece bikini! He couldn't help but think how weird he looked wearing it. After surfing the web for a few minutes, he heard his phone buzz, he reached over to his nightstand and turned it on to see he got a text:

"Hey Josh, are you still coming to the mall with me to shop for clothes tomorrow morning?"- Christina Goching

Josh recognized as the name of the girl Courtney said she was meeting up with the next day. He could just go and get it over with, as long as he kept Courtney happy she would swap back friends with him on schedule. The only problem was he didn't have a ride, so he decided to ask for one:

"Yeah I plan to, but I don't have a ride."

Josh got his response very quickly:

"Okay no problem, my mom can pick you up on our way. Is 9:30 okay?"

"That's fine. Thanks!" He texted her.

Christina sent him a bonus text:

"No problem! Just think, next year you can drive us to the mall. :)"

Josh realized that she was right, as he was 15 now and getting his driver's license in a year.

Suddenly, Josh heard his mom call up the stairs. "Courtney! Jennifer is here to see you!"

Josh forgot that she was supposed to come over after his crazy past couple of hours. But he realized that it was his sister's problem now.

Seeing as though he had nothing to do, he camped outside of Courtney's and Bri's room, where Jenn currently was at the moment. He was listening to their conversation "So, are you ready for me to help you study for that math test?" He heard Jenn ask. He guessed that she came to tutor his sister instead of studying with him.

"Sure. Just let me get my books out!" He heard Courtney say.

"Alright, I'll go to the bathroom while you do that." Jenn told her.

It took Josh a minute to realize, but the room that his younger sister's shared didn't have a connecting bathroom like his did, which meant Jenn would come out and see him! Josh sat down for a minute to think it over. In the end, he decided _______.
11131.title: Josh hears something odd.

111311.content:
Josh sat down for a minute to think it over. In the end, he decided to take something from Courtney. He wasn't sure what he wanted though. She was the opposite gender, younger, smaller, and had no skills that appealed to him accept the ones she already took from him.

Then Josh thought of two things that seemed appealing that he might find useful. The first thing was swapping chores. The chores for him required hard work and were a lot more strenuous than the work his sisters had to do.

The second option was a bit more complicated. It was obvious that Courtney knew how to socialize since she had many friends. One thing that Josh thought he could take was her ability to socialize with females in order to get closer to Jenn. He didn't relate to his crush much when it came to gender and he felt that he needed more confidence when talking to her, in order to build confidence in maybe asking her out in the future. If he got Courtney's ability, he would be able to conquer both of those problems.

Josh finally came to a decision after some hard thinking. "Okay Courtney, I'd like to swap ________."
111311.title: Take something from Courtney

choices: Courtney and Josh agree to the swap.
Josh decides to go after something else.
111313.content:
Josh sat down for a minute to think it over. In the end, he decided that he was going to take something from his sister to get a little bit of revenge. He took a moment to think it over and see what would be the best thing for him. He took a moment to go back on the porch and watched Courtney continue to toss the basketball into the hoop. As he watched, Josh couldn't help but be amazed at how well she was putting her ability to work.

'What would be the best thing to take from her so that she would want to swap back?' Josh thought to himself. 'I could request to take her clothes.' Being quite the social butterfly, Courtney always loved her clothes. It was the thing that set her apart from all of the others in her year. Even though they weren't the most expensive, her outfits were considered so well put together that everyone was jealous. Josh shook his head to get the idea out of his head. Even though it would make his sister more manly looking, it gave him a chance to get his skills and knowledge back.

"What are you thinking about?" Courtney asked, breaking Josh out of his thoughts. Josh looked over and noticed that she seemed a bit exhausted from her little work out that she just had. A thin layer of sweat started to bead around her brow and her skin seemed to a bit flushed, all from the bit of exercise that she'd been through.

"Oh nothing really." Josh lied as he turned away to avert her gaze, not wanting his sister to get an idea of what he was thinking.

"I think I know what you were thinking?" Courtney giggled as she set the basketball down so that she could sit down next to him. Josh couldn't help but blush at the comment. "I thought so." She nudged her brother as she continued to giggle a little more. "So what were you thinking about getting in exchange for your skills?"

Josh thought about it for a moment. Did he want to tell his sister what he was thinking about? "Yeah, what of it?" He asked defensively, crossing his arms.

"Well, what did you want to swap?" Courtney asked eagerly. "We can swap strength or height." She named off a couple things, then had a stroke of genius. "Ooo... We can swap heights."

"That's not what I was thinking about." Josh replied with a somewhat angry tone. "If I were to swap any of those things, they would only help you." He spoke with a matter of fact tone.

"Then what were you wanting to swap with me for your skills?" She asked, waiting for her brother's decision with great anticipation.

Josh decided that now was the time to declare what he wanted in exchange for his skills. Taking a deep breath, Josh told her what he was thinking just a moment earlier. "I was thinking about taking your clothes and maybe accessories, I don't really know."

Courtney couldn't help but laugh at her brother's request. Just the thought of him wearing her clothes over the weekend or even going to school with him made her giddy. "I think that would be a great idea."

"Wait, you do?" Josh asked with great confusion.

"Yeah." Courtney replied back with a grin on her face. "That way you know what it's like for a girl to get ready in the mornings."
111313.title: Something else.

1113131.content:
It took several minutes for Courtney to think it over. "You know what?" Courtney asked with a smile on her face. "I think that would be a great idea, besides, you'd look cute wearing my clothes." She giggled at her brother's uncomfortable look. "What's wrong? I mean, it was your idea after all."

Blushing, Josh just looked away, trying to avoid eye contact with his younger sister. "Well, I was just trying to get something that I know that you loved and that came to mind." He replied trying to explain his reasoning. "Well are we going to do this or not?"

"Well, hold on a minute." Courtney smiled at her brother's eager attitude. "I think we need to stop and talk about what we're going to swap."

"What is there to talk about, I want to swap our clothing and accessories." Josh suggested as he was ready to get this over with and go back upstairs. "I mean, it's not that important."

"Well, it is." Courtney suggested as she sat down next to her brother. "You see. If you want to have my accessories, then that will involve makeup and jewelry. So if you want that then I think you'll need to take those skills to go with them." She watched as the gears turned in her brother's head once again. She was hoping that her brother would take the swap. Since she'd seen what her brother could do, Courtney wanted to see if she could see how other people live. Thinking back at her life, her Mom always seemed to push her to do the beauty pageants and she never really had time to do anything else. Whenever the time came around for the sport tryouts, she'd always wanted to tryout for some of them, but her Mom always seemed to push her towards the pageants.

"I don't know if I want that?" Josh groaned as he thought it more.

"Then I don't know if I want to swap back your sport skills." Courtney pointed out to her brother. "I only want to see why Bri has a great time being a tomboy is all and you don't want to swap that with me."
1113131.title: Courtney and Josh agree to the swap.

choices: Josh goes back up to his room.
One of Courtney's friends gives her a call.
11131311.content:
"Then I don't know if I want to swap back your sport skills." Courtney pointed out to her brother. "I only want to see why Bri has a great time being a tomboy is all and you don't want to swap that with me." Upon hearing this, Josh's eyes grew big with astonishment. He really wanted to get his sports skills back from his sister, but he really didn't want to take all those things from her. "Well, are we going to do this, or am I going to enjoy having these new skills?" She asked with a huge smile on her face and she picked up the ball. "I mean, I don't mind being able to do this." She chuckled as she bounced the ball in a seemingly professional manner.

"Fine, what did you want to swap?" Josh asked in a seemingly perturbed manner. He watched in disbelief as Courtney stopped dribbling the ball and started to spin it on her finger, seemingly out of spite to his ego.

"What do you mean what?" Courtney asked with a chuckle. "I already told you." She put the ball down and held up her hand, to help count everything. "Clothes, accessories, and our daily routine skills." Holding up the three fingers to show that she meant business, Courtney felt like she had the upper hand in the negotiations. Ever since they were kids, she had always known the way to get what she wanted, which is why Josh knew she would make a shrewd businesswoman later on in life. "Do we have a deal or not?"

Josh thought about it for a moment and started to sigh. "Fine, I agree to swap those with you." The bright light seemed like a flash of lightning from the clear sky. As the spots disappeared from Josh's eyes, he felt like something was off about his body. Looking down, he saw that he now wore his sister's clothes. 'Why did I do this?' He thought to himself as he brought his hands up to his ears to feel that they were now pierced and he also had her earrings in them.

"Thank you." Courtney chuckled as she bounced up and down with excitement.
11131311.title: Josh swaps everything Courtney wants.

choices: Josh tells Courtney "you can keep em"
Josh realized what he had been thinking
Josh and Jenn go clothes shopping.
111313111.content:
Josh went up to his room to look at himself. When he saw himself in the mirror he realized something was wrong. What he wore was 'nice' on Courtney, but he had a different complexion than she did. He had gained not only all of her skills but also her passion for fashion. He decided to go into the bathroom and reapply his makeup. He found all of his (formerly Courtney's) makeup supplies. The first thing he did was wash off the makeup with cold cream to make sure it was all gone. He knew that was the best way to reapply it. Then he started with some foundation. He really needed a lighter shade than she did, but this would have to do for now. Then he worked on the various areas of his face. All his makeup had to fit together, but each area had it's own concern. Before putting on eye makeup, he decided he had to pluck his eyebrows.

It took almost an hour before he got his makeup on right. It wouldn't take this long every time, but since this was his first time he was taking extra care. Plus he had to get the colors right. Next he went back to his room to change into another outfit. That also took a while to find the right apparel. Courtney complained about how long it took to get ready, but in reality she had loved every minute of it. This love carried over to Josh.

As times passed, all he remembered about sports was that he had liked it once, but it didn't seem as important to him now. Not as important as getting properly made up. He knew that with the swap, no one would find his new apparel and make up choices odd. They might not like how he put together an outfit, but everyone had their individual tastes. Maybe if he never got back his sport skills it might not be such a bad thing. They were silly games anyway.

This might help with Jenn he thought. Jenn didn't know much about sports, but she knew a lot about fashion. He could invite her to go shopping. Maybe things will heat up with them.

What happens next?
111313111.title: Josh goes back up to his room.

11133.content:
Josh gave up on trying to think about the things involving sports he suddenly forgot and tried playing some video games to take his mind off of things. He heard another knock in his door as he played. "Come in." He said to the person behind the door.

The person behind the door was once again Courtney. "You won't believe what happened." She said.

"I thought I told you to..."

"I know." She continued. "But this is good."

"Fine, what is it?" He asked with a tone of impatience.

"It turns out it's supposed to rain like today for all of next week. Josie just texted me and said that Sporty week has been postponed until a week later in the year."

"So does that mean I can have my sport skills and knowledge back?" He said hopefully.

"Sure." She answered before the blinding light came for a visit again.

"Okay, are we done here?"

"Well I was thinking that since you got your sport skills back, we could make another swap in place of it. You know just for fun."

Figuring it would get her out of his room faster, Josh gave it some consideration. "Okay fine, ONE swap." He told her with an emphasis on the limited amount.

"I'd like to swap our ______." She announced.
11133.title: Something else

choices: Courtney decides to mess with her brother a bit more
Josh tries to get back at his sister
111331.content:
"I'd like to swap our height." She announced.

"Are you serious? You couldn't have picked anything else?" He asked.

"Hey, you said I could choose another swap. That's what I want."

"You've got to to be kidding me." He said to himself.

Hearing what he said, Courtney acted upon it. "Well we could always try something else. How about groins?" She teased jokingly, amused at the reaction of horror that came from her brothers face.

"I agree, I agree." He said as another flash entered. Then after, Josh found that he had shrunken by three quarters of a foot to his sister's height.

On the opposite end, Courtney had grown by that amount. Her arms and legs had gotten much longer as well. "Wow! Talk about a growth spurt." She was satisfied with how her threat went, even if causing the swap was unintentional.

"I think we're done here. Now leave!" Josh said pointing to the door.

Courtney looked down to see her disgruntled brother. "Aww... you look so cute when your that small!"

"Courtney, stop it!" He demanded. She continued on, and Josh just decided to ignore her once he became frustrated with her teasing. He eventually lunged for his phone.

His sister meanwhile, wanted to have some fun with the swap. She snatched Josh's phone from right off of his nightstand and held it up in the air where Josh would not be able to reach it.

"Give it back sis!" Josh whined as she just laughed at him.

"What's the magic word?"

"Please?"

"Now get down on your knees and beg for it." She commanded.

"What?"

"I said do it!"

Courtney got even more of a laugh when Josh did this, as he seemed as he was even smaller. "Please, just give me my phone back."

"Okay, but only because you look so cute!" She patted him on the head and handed him his phone before leaving.
111331.title: Height

111332.content:
"I'd like to swap our place in the family." She announced.

"What does that even mean?" Josh thought out loud.

Not realizing that he made his thought vocal, he was surprised to get an answer. "It means that I'll be the oldest and you would then become the middle child."

That didn't seem that bad to Josh, the swap wasn't something physical or life-changing. Plus, the sooner he agreed to a swap the sooner Courtney would leave him alone. "Okay, works for me."

When the light cleared, Josh opened his eyes to find that nothing in the unchanged bedroom had changed from what Josh could tell. "Did it work?" He heard his sister ask.

"I'm not sure. I guess time will tell." He said while leaving the room. "I'm getting a drink I'm parched."

When he arrived downstairs, he started to pour a glass of water when his mom walked in. "Josh sweetie, Brianna and I are heading over to her friend Katie's house for a few hours. It just you and your older brother. He's in charge." She said before kissing his forehead and walking out toward the front door.

"Well that was weird." Josh thought as he finished pour his glass and headed back upstairs. He found Courtney to still be in his room when he returned.

"Did mom leave?" She asked. All Josh did was nod. "Okay then, I want to show you something." She gestured for him to follow her.

"Me first." He said. "Mom said she was going to be gone with Bri for a few hours, she said 'it's just you and your older brother. And he's in charge'."

"Really?" She questioned curiously.

"Uh huh." It seems that we swapped gender roles in the family as well.

"That cool." She replied. "But look." She motioned for Josh to come to his nightstand. Now he knew what she wanted to show him. Every picture of him was now of Courtney. "It seems that I'm the older brother now and this is my room." She explained with a sense of joy in her voice.

"But... that can't be." He said.

"But... it is." She answered while mocking him. "Have fun sharing a room with Bri."

"Great." He mumbled sarcastically.

"Also Josh, I need my privacy. I'm gonna have to ask you to leave my room." She said.

"But..."

"No buts! I'm the older brother and mom said I'm in charge. Now get outta my room, SIS!" Courtney teased him, obviously having fun with the situation.

All Josh could do was hang his head in defeat and exit, he certainly was not enthusiastic about the swap he had just made now.
111332.title: Place in the family

choices: Josh spends some time with Jenn
1113322.content:
Josh rose from his bed and initially became surprised since he forgot that he had swapped his place in the family with the middle sister of the family. "So it really wasn't a dream." He realized in thought, seeing as he had slept in Courtney's bed. "This is gonna take some getting used to." He went over to Courtney's dresser and pulled out a pair of his own boxers. "At least I still have my own clothes." He said aloud.

When he got downstairs, he could see that he was the last one to wake up. His mom was just finishing up on fixing his breakfast, while the girls were at the circular table. "There's my biggest girlie!" His mother said, using a a nickname normally reserved for Courtney. As she brought his plate over, he saw that Bri was mindlessly eating away at her breakfast. However, he noticed Courtney was sitting in his normal seat at the table across from their mom. And sure enough his mother placed his breakfast where his sister normally sat, in between her mother and younger sister.

"Wow, she's really embracing this 'big brother role'." He thought. His mother took a seat at her normal seat, so Josh sat in between her and Bri with no other option.

Other than the seating change, nothing was out of the ordinary for the remainder of breakfast. As they were finishing up, Josh heard the phone ring. "I'll get it." He said, as Courtney's seat was closer to where the phone was located. "Mitchell residence, Josh speaking. How may I help you?"

"Hey Josh, it's Jenn." His friend said from the other end of the line. "I was just wondering if you wanted to swing by my house for a little while."

"Awesome, sounds like fun!"

"Great," She continued. "if your older brother wants to come too Kira's just playing video games by herself."

"I'll tell her, see ya soon."

"Who was that hun?" His mother asked.

"Jenn. She said that me and Courtney are invited to go to their house." He said.

"Is that fine Courtney? Do you want to go with your sister?" Kim inquired.

"I'm in." Courtney said.

"Good, I'll drive you two over then."

Bri left after breakfast with her friend Jenna for their soccer game, so having her tag along was unnecessary. After the two siblings packed some stuff up in their new rooms, they both headed out to the car with Josh leading the way. We went to the passenger's seat door and opened it.

"Eh eh eh!" His mom said to stop him. "Josh, you know that the oldest gets to ride in the front. Sit in the back and let your big brother sit up here." Knowing he had no chance at winning an argument, Josh headed toward the back he saw Courtney smirking at him as he walked by.

The new older brother was surprised with the extra perk she was getting to go with being older, and was starting to realize there opportunities that would open up since she was viewed as older. "I could get used to this." She thought.
1113322.title: The next day...

112.content:
Josh continued in his attempt to dry off and getting into some drier clothing before his overprotective mother caught him. He quickly found a blue, 'retro' looking 'School House Rock' T-shirt and slipped it over his head. Just in time too, because just then he heard a light rapping on his door. "Yeah?" He called out to the mysterious visitor behind the doorway. The door creaked open and in walked his youngest sister, Brianna, carrying her 3rd grade math book under her arm. "Hey there Bri, what's going on?" He asked as he picked up the drenched shirt and tossed it into the hamper across the room.

"Why are you wet?" She asked him as he eyed both him and the shirt that he recently tossed into the hamper. "What happened to your umbrella?"

"You probably wouldn't believe me if I told you." Josh sighed as he motioned her to his used office chair next to his desk. "Do you need help with something?" Bri nodded and caused her long brown hair to fall into her eyes.

"I need some help with these multiplication problems." She responded as she grabbed the rogue pieces of hair and brought them back behind her ear in an attempt to bring them back under her control. Bri then placed the book on the desk and opened it to the problems.

"Oh, it's not too bad." Josh chuckled as he went on to explaining the rules for multiplication and smiled when he saw his younger sister nodding, almost as if she understood what he was saying. "So you got it?"

"Yeah, I think I get it now. Just the way that she was explaining it." She then gestured her hand going over her head

"Yeah, they tend to over simplify things." Josh chuckled again and they sat in silence for several seconds before one of them began to talk once more.

"So, what happened to you today after you missed the bus?" Bri wondered as she continued to work on her math problems.

Josh knew he couldn't keep it to himself forever so he told her the story. How the rain seemed to come down in sheets, how he met up with the older lady that had the creaky walker, and how she gave him the 'gift'. "That's about it." Josh replied as he sighed in relief.

"So you don't really believe that mumbo jumbo, do you?" Bri laughed as she thought about magic. She had always been much more down to earth than her other siblings and didn't really believe in magic.

"Well, I haven't really had a chance to think about it." Josh sat back down on his bed and looked at the hamper that he tossed his clothes earlier.

Bri brought her nose closer to the paper, almost as if she was really getting into the math problems. Just as she did, her hair began to fall into her face once more. "I wish that this hair would just stay where it supposed to be." She grumbled as she brought it back behind her ear.

"Well, I would certainly take it off of your hands if I could." Josh said to her reassuringly as he gently patted her on her back to emphasize the point.

"And I would gladly give it to you." She chuckled as the both closed their eyes because of a blinding light filled the room. "What happened?" Bri asked as she brought her hands up to her head to relieve a scratch. What happened next would make her believe in magic. He once long, straight brown hair had turned into short, cropped hairstyle a boy would wear. "My hair!" She responded as she looked over at her brother who seemed to be having the same problem.

"Why do you have my hair and I have yours?" Josh wondered as he tried to get his new mane of hair under control.

"I don't know?" She replied as she continued to feel her hair. "You just said that you would take it off my hands if you could."

"And then the flash of light happened." Josh interrupted as he played the story out in his head. His new hair started to get in his eyes once more and he grew more aggravated with it. Taking it firmly in his hands, Josh balled it up and threw it behind him.

"You can't do that." Bri said angrily as she made her way over to him. "You're going to get it all knotted up. Maybe if we redo what happened, we can get out hair back." She suggested.

"I guess that could work." Josh agreed as he patted the bed right next to him so that she could sit down too. "I would gladly take it off of your hands if I could." Josh announced and closed his eyes as he anticipated the blinding light. After now seeing the light, he reopened his eyes. "What happened? Why didn't it work like it was supposed to?"

Bri sat there for a moment and thought about it. "Oh..." She squealed with delight. "And I would give it to you." The blinding light came back once more and after the two of them were able to come back to their senses, they brought their hands up to their heads to feel their hair. "I'm back to normal." Bri said happily as she bounced up and down on the bed.

"Me too." Josh replied back to her.

"I guess that lady did give you something." Bri said to her brother. "I guess we both have to agree for it to work." Josh sat there for a moment to think about what had just transpired. "But I do have something to ask of you." Bri turned to her brother and looked in his eyes. "I have a game tomorrow morning and I was wondering if I could borrow your hair so that it wouldn't get in my way."

"I guess I can." Josh answered back to her. "How long will I need to keep it for?"

"Well, the game is tomorrow afternoon, so I guess until bedtime tomorrow?" She suggested.

"I guess we can do that." Josh replied tentatively, but that seemed to be good enough for his new found power to work and the blinding light soon enveloped the two of them. He felt his new hair cascade down his shoulders to the middle of his back.

"I think I could enjoy this." Bri chuckled as she looked at her brother with her hairstyle on his head and noticed his grim look on his face. "Oh it's alright. I mean, it's not like I'm making you play in my place..."

Josh's eyes grew 2 sizes when he heard this. "No, that is one thing I'm not going to do." He replied as he brought his hands up to protect himself from something.

"It's not that bad, but we can certainly trade some other stuff and I'm sure you've always wanted to see what its like to be a girl." She suggested to him. "It might even get you a girlfriend."

"No, I'm perfectly happy being a guy and I'm just not ready to have a girlfriend yet." He announced as he folded his hands across his chest.

"Right..." She said smiling as she began to bait him into something. "I bet you're too scared to make another swap."

"I'm not scared." Josh announced proudly. "I'm sure I could handle almost anything." He stuck out his chest to show his bravery.

"Okay." Bri replied back to him. "How about we swap _________ and you can prove it to me."
112.title: Bri wants some help with her homework.

"Honestly, I just wondered what it would be like to pee standing up." She chuckled as she stood up mimicking what she imagined Josh would do.

"So this is all that it's about." He chuckled as he secured his new longer hair behind his ear. "Penis envy?"

Josh stood back for a moment thinking about what he could do. One... He could go along with what she wanted and swap his penis with her, so that she could see what it would be like. Or two... He could just tell her no and keep her hair for an unforeseen amount of time. He looked at his sister and noticed that her face looked to be a little scruffier than her normal fair, smooth complexion. "Well, I know one thing." He said with a smile on his face. "You got all of my hair with the swap."

Bri looked down at her pant covered legs and lifted up one of them to look at them. To her amazement, they were now covered with a small amount of darkening hair. Josh's legs were just starting to get their amount of hair on them with his advancement into puberty. She let go and just shrugged. "I can live with it for now." She said with a smile. "So what will it be?"

Bri, on the other hand, found her pants bulge out significantly. "Ouch." She cried out as she brought her hands down. "I think my panties are a too small for your... I mean, my new stuff. What do you say we do one last swap to make each other more comfy while we are like this? How about we swap underwear too."

"Fine, if it will make you happy." Josh mumbled as he closed his eyes in preparation for the blinding light. After the light subsided, he felt a new constriction around his waist. He pulled the band of his pajama pants to see the pink, polka dotted panties that his sister wore just earlier, but now enlarged to fit his larger frame. After beating up and decapitating some monsters for about an hour Josh suddenly hear a cry of pain from Bri's room. Dropping his controller he made a mad dash to his sisters room to see what was wrong. She was sitting at the edge of her bed with her hands to her (or more accurately Josh's) crotch with streams of tears running down her face. Very worried for his sister he go to her and tried to calm her down, "Sh sh shhhh. Bri. Take a deep breath. Tell me what's wrong."

Bri stopped her wailing and took a couple of long sniffs, "I I I broke them."

"You did what?!" Josh said sounding less calm than he'd like, what had his sister done to his manhood?

"I wa-wa-was jumping on the bed and then a landed on my butt. But-but I was on your..." Bri pointed to her groin before continuing, "And it hurts so much!" Bri started to cry all over again. "Okay Bri. I agree to swap our genitals back." The flash of light that took place when the siblings swapped hair and genitals for the first time arrived again. He didn't feel as much pain as he expected though, realizing that the only reason Bri was crying was because she had never felt pain down there before, but he had more of a tolerance for it. He decided to fake pain so Bri wouldn't suspect anything though, he was happy he got his own groin back and didn't want Bri trying to take it back.

When Josh got back to his room he felt his long hair and remembered Bri still had his hair, but it was better off the hair being the only remaining thing to regain rather than his penis or underwear.

Josh resumed playing his video games and after about another half an hour, someone knocked on his door. "Come in!" He said, silently praying it wasn't Bri. His other sister Courtney appeared from behind the door, visibly frustrated.

"I'm tired of mom telling me what's right and what's wrong. She's always trying to make me behave like a 'young lady'." She complained.

Josh figured it would be a good time to be a role model for one of his younger siblings. "She's just trying to help you. Right?" He said, trying to reason with her.

"I guess so, but she's always saying 'well, a lady wouldn't do this' or 'a lady wouldn't do that'. I wish she would just treat me the way she treats you. She doesn't care about what you do as much because your a boy."

Josh took a deep breath, realizing he was probably about to tell Courtney something he would regret. "You know, I could help you with that." He hinted.

"What do you mean?" She said not understanding.

Josh went on to explain everything from the old lady at the bus stop to knowing his swapping powers worked for sure after testing it with Bri and her hair, leaving out the groin and underwear part though.

"Well, did you swap back your hair?" Courtney asked.

Josh was about to say no, but then he saw something that he didn't notice before. Right behind Courtney, there was a picture of a younger him with his father before he died. The picture had changed now however, as Josh had Bri's longer hair. He realized that his swaps affected reality! That meant that his new hair appeared as normal to everyone else. He didn't try to hide it from Courtney because he didn't think twice about it.

"Yeah we swapped back after a few minutes, we were just testing the power." He said.

"Oh, because I would have loved to see you with short hair!" She laughed. "I just can't picture you with it." Those two sentences confirmed Josh's theory.

"So do you believe me?" He asked.

"Not really, but it doesn't hurt to try."

"Fair enough." Josh said nodding his head.

"So how can you help me?" Courtney asked curiously.

"I guess I could swap our perceived genders so mom would think your a boy." He told her, but she looked unsure. "We wouldn't undergo any physical change to make it easier." He added.

That last part did for Courtney as she said "Okay, I'll swap my perceived gender with yours." She said. For the sixth time of the day, the blinding flash came, but this time, nothing was different physically after the light. "Did it work?" She asked.

"I think so." Josh said. "There was no physical change, but we will find out soon enough."

"So..." Courtney said trailing off. "How long should we stay like this?"

"How about until tomorrow morning?" He proposed. "That will give us enough time to test it without having to stay like this for too long."

"You've got yourself a deal!" Courtney said as she held her hand out to her brother, where they officially shook on it.

Right after their handshake, the siblings heard their mom call up the stairs. "Hey _____, can you _________ for me?"
