"She wanted to try on my clothes, at first I didn't want to, but I couldn't say no to her." Josh tried to use as an excuse.
"You could have just said no, what would everyone think if they saw you in her clothes?! They could think you are a cross dresser or maybe they would think you're gay."
"You are way over thinking this mom, she's just a friend, friends trade things with each other."
"Girls may trade clothes with each other, but a girl and a boy can't do that. You are going to get changed right now! I don't ever want to see you in Jenn's clothes again!"
"I will, I will."

His mom left his room for Josh to change back into some of his own clothes, it didn't take long for him to get changed into some jeans, a black and red shirt and a comfortable pair of sneakers.
After he's done he calls his mom he's done changing and she walks back in.
112111112121331232.title: His mom walks in and sees him wearing Jenn'...

choices: He tries to fix the situation.
He decides to try and convince his mom to drop the punishment.
Jenn arrives with the rest of her wardrobe.
1121111121213312322.content:
"Why in the world were you wearing Jenn's clothes?" Kim asked her son as she walked back into the room.
"She wanted to try mine on and I couldn't say no to her, I told you." Josh said as he looked over at Jenn's clothes next to him.
"You shouldn't just let her keep your clothes just because you like her." Kim said with a disapproving tone.
"I did kind of like them, so I decided it wouldn't hurt to keep them a little." Josh admitted causing his mom to start laughing.
"You should have just admitted that, there's nothing wrong with that, but don't lie to me, you know I can tell." Kim scolded.
"I know mom."

"But because you lied to me, there is something I want you to do."
"What punishment did you think of this time?" Josh complained.
"It it is a punishment is up to you, but for as long as you and Jenn don't swap them back, I want you to keep wearing her clothes, even at home or in public." She announced.
"You can't do that!" Josh almost screamed.
"I can, while you were changing I called Jenn's parents as well and explained the situation, we thought it would be a fitting punishment for you to swap all of your clothes for a while, until you have learned your lessons." She continued causing Josh's heart to drop.
"You're bluffing, they would never agree to something so stupid."
"We thought this way you would realize how much you are making fools of yourselves."

"I thought you said you didn't want to see me in her clothes ever again?" Josh reminded her.
"I did, but then I realized being angry at you wasn't going to make you understand, so we came up with this solution."
"You're taking this too far." Josh complained.
"Maybe we are, but sometimes we have to to make you kids understand. Jenn should be here soon with all of her clothes, start gathering yours too." She said sternly as she left the room.

Josh couldn't believe this, he started thinking of ways to get himself out of this.
He could swap something with someone in an attempt to fix things, or dump the situation on someone else. This all started when he got his clothes back so maybe swapping clothes with one of his sisters would fix it again. but then again, he might just make it worse.
1121111121213312322.title: Mom had calmed down.

choices: Kim tells Josh, "Time for a mani/pedi"
11211111212133123223.content:
Kim returned to Josh's room carrying several big black garbage bags. "Courtney," Kim said to Josh, "I want you to pack up all your clothes and put them in these bags before Jenn gets here."

"But Mom."

"Courtney Stacy Mitchell don't make me tell you again." Josh knew she was mad. He had better do what she said. After a while Josh had piled up all his clothes in the garbage bags. There were several bags left.

""Is that all?"

"Yes Mom."

"What about your underwear?"

Josh didn't think she meant his underwear too. He had swapped outfits with Jenn, but certainly not her underwear. "My underwear?"

"Yes they are your clothes also." Josh did as he was told and scooped all his underwear and placed it in another bag.

"Done," he said.

"What about your shoes?" Josh knew better than to ask. He took his shoes and put them into another bag.

"Is that all?"

"I think so.

"What about the clothes you are wearing."

"But..."

"Take off all you are wearing and put them in the bags."

"But..."

"Don't worry you can wear Jenn's clothes. They are still right on the bed."

Josh stripped on put on Jenn's clothes. He was back in her skinny jeans and top. They were clearly girl's clothing. Everything he had been wearing went into one of the bags. That included his sneakers and socks. The only thing he had on that was truly his was his underwear. He only had that because he didn't have a pair of Jenn's panties to wear.

Soon enough, Jenn arrived at Josh's house. She was accompanied by her mother. Jenn was wearing Josh's clothes. They weren't anything special, jeans and a t-shirt. Kim instructed Josh to help bring in Jenn's stuff. They brought in Jenn's clothes also stuffed in garbage bags. Jenn had many more bags of clothes than Josh did.

Jenn and Josh both looked miserable. "OK," Kim said, "it's time to make it official."

"Courtney I want to you say, 'Jenn will you swap clothes with me?"

"Mom!"

"Courtney say it!" Kim warned.

"Jenn will you swap clothes with me?" Josh asked reluctantly.

"Good."

Next Jenn's mother told Jenn to say something similar to what Josh said.

"Courtney, will you swap clothes with me?" Jenn said.

"SAY IT," Kim reminded Josh in a menacing tone."

"yes," josh said in a meek voice.

"Yes what?"

"Yes, I will swap clothes with you."

With the magic words spoken. Josh found himself wearing his own clothes again. He was back into his own jeans and t-shirt. Jenn was wearing her own skinny jeans, white blouse and matching jacket. The problem was that she thought she was wearing Josh's clothing. Inside all the packed bags, clothing were swapped. The bags brought by Jenn, contained all of Josh's clothing and vice versa. Josh would be wearing his own clothing, including underwear from now until his mother told him he could 'swap' back but everyone would think he was wearing girl's clothes.

It was such an odd turn of events. Josh could be wearing his own jeans and t-shirt but everyone would treat him like he was wearing a dress and pantyhose. At least if he was truly wearing Jenn's clothes he could choose the least feminine close possible. But since they were his own clothes he didn't know which clothes was like wearing a dress and which clothes were like wearing jeans.

Josh helped Jenn pack up her car and then they drove away.

What happened next?
11211111212133123223.title: Jenn arrives with the rest of her wardrobe.

choices: Josh decides to swap clothes with Jenn and wear the clothes everyone expects.
Josh offers a different swap instead.
Josh refuses to swap anything with Jenn for now.
112111112121331232233.content:
After Jenn left, Josh returned back to his room, happy he had his own clothes back, but everyone would think they were Jenn's.
This wasn't a very comfortable thought, he imagined what they would have to go through at school and shuddered at the thought.

He was about to play some games when his phone rang, the caller ID showed it was Jenn. Quickly getting up, Josh picked up the phone.
"Hey Jenn." Josh said nervously.
"Hey Courtney, sorry about today, it's all my fault for pushing you to swap clothes with me at school." Jenn apologized.
"No don't worry, I liked switching clothes with you, it was interesting at least, but I didn't realize our parents would respond like this.
"Me neither, but what's even stranger is that when your mom forced us to say we'd swap clothes, suddenly I had my own clothes back on, you noticed it too right?" Jenn said suspiciously.
"Yeah about that, I may have had something to do with that..." Josh said mumbling a little.
"What do you mean?" Jenn asked suspiciously.

After explaining the situation to Jenn, including the swaps he made with his sisters, Jenn seemed to understand.
"So you are supposed to have your own room, your name is actually Josh, not Courtney, your sisters are currently having each other's clothes, you have Courtney's voice and she has yours? Does that about cover it?"
"Yep that's all." Josh said shuddering at the reminder of his past swaps.
"So, if we wanted to, we can fix this clothes swap?" Jenn suggested.
"Only partly, we can makes sure everyone sees the clothes as normal again, meaning I would actually be wearing yours instead of them just thinking so, but I doubt I can rewrite reality to get rid of this punishment." Josh said sadly.

After a few seconds of silence, Jenn spoke up again.
"So we'll be stuck with everyone thinking we're cross-dressing anyway, so we might as well actually wear them." She suggested.
"I'm not sure, wearing my own clothes again does feel good." Josh said not sold on the idea yet.
"Oh come on Josh, then at least you will get to experience wearing my clothes and you can choose what clothes other people will see you wear, right now, I'm not sure what would count as a dress or skirt." Jenn said reminding Josh of the thoughts he was having earlier.
"You bring up a good point, but I have worn my sister's clothes for a while already."
"My clothes are different from her's, come on Josh, I want to try on yours as well." Jenn practically begged.
112111112121331232233.title: Reader's choice

choices: Kim makes Josh shave his legs and underarms
Kim teaches Josh to walk in heels and put on a bra properly
1121111121213312322331.content:
This had gotten way out of hand. Josh had made several swaps and now he wasn't called by his own name and even though he was wearing his normal clothes people would be thinking he is dressed like some fairy. Not to mention his tween sister is dressed like a little girl and vice versa. Even the voice in his head sounded like a girl. Josh wanted to return to normal and then once everyone was back to themselves he could swap things again. Hopefully this time with some thought behind the swaps.

The first place to swap was to return to normal as far as his own clothes were concerned. "OK, let's swap."

"Really?"

"Yeah, I agree to swap clothes with you," Josh said formally.

"I want to swap too."

Before Josh knew it he was back to wearing Jenn's clothing. He had on her jeans and t-shirt. It was more girly than a boy should wear but in general, it wasn't too bad. Underneath it all he was also wearing panties although he wasn't wearing a bra.

"Thanks," Jenn said. "Maybe after this punishment is over we can swap something else."

"I don't know, I'm starting to feel all swapped out. I mean look what happened."

"You'll think differently later."

They got off the phone and Josh tried to come up with a plan to get everyone back to normal. Josh was deep in thought when his mom entered the room.

"Courtney," she announced, "I've come to pick out what you will be wearing tomorrow."

"What, I can pick my own clothes."

"Not during the punishment. I'll pick out what you will be wearing. You'll just find some unisex thing and that wouldn't be a punishment would it. So let's start this thing out with a bang. Not a dress, we'll save that. But not skinny jeans either. I think a nice skirt and a blouse. Something nice for school."

"MOM.."

"Yes, and I think you should wear some heels with that. It's school so nothing too high, maybe something an inch and a half or two inches. Let me look through YOUR things."

Josh was speechless. He didn't expect his mom to go even crazier than she had before.

"Hey you wanted to wear Jenn's clothes, you should get the full gambit of her things," Kim continued. Then she looked through the drawers. She knew what was in there as she had helped Josh pack up all of Jenn's stuff. He didn't like putting away his own stuff, putting away Jenn's stuff wouldn't have happened if Kim hadn't insisted.

"Let's see for tomorrow, you can wear this skirt and tunic. Let me find some heels to go with this. Also, from now on, you are always wear a bra at all times from when you get dressed in the morning until you are in your nightgown or pajamas at night."

"But I don't have breasts."

"I don't care." "Wait," Kim said, as if she just remembered something. "What's the weather for tomorrow? Isn't it supposed to be chilly in the morning?"

"What does that matter?"

"Well if it's chilly, then you'll need to wear tights under your skirt."

"Oh my god," Josh mumbled under his breath.

"I'll be right back. I'll check the weather on cable."

Josh should have never swapped back with Jenn. He missed his old clothes.

What happened next?
1121111121213312322331.title: Josh decides to swap clothes with Jenn and wear...

choices: Josh texts with Jenn and discuss their situation.
Courney walks in looking very confused.
Mom walks back in with a new demand.
Josh gets to relax for now.
11211111212133123223311.content:
Just as Josh was about to start texting Jenn again his mom walked in again.
"Follow me to the bathroom." She ordered with a stern voice.
"Okay." Was all Josh could say as he didn't want to upset his mom more.

As soon as they entered the bathroom, his mother locked the door behind them and looked at him.
"Take off your skinny jeans and your shirt." She declared.
"Why?"
"Just take them off." His mother said with a glare.

Josh Quickly stripped out of Jenn's jeans and top. Even though they were now practically his, they were still Jenn's size, so they were kind of tight on him still.
After a few minutes Josh was now standing in some panties only.
"Mom this is embarrassing." Josh said as she covered himself with a towel.
"You are going to wear a skirt tomorrow, as well as a nice top, I can't have your hairy legs and arms show with them, you need to shave them." She ordered handing him a razor.
"MOM!" Josh said but was cut off by a glare.
"I'll be right back, if you are not shaved by the time I am back, I'll shave them for you." She declared.
She grabbed Josh's discarded clothes and put them in the laundry basket, as she took it with her as well.

"Damn it, there go my jeans." Josh said as he watched his mom leave.
He looked at the razor and his legs and arms, not enjoying what he was about to do. He knew how to shave, so he grabbed everything he needed and started to slowly shave his arms and legs as smooth as possible.

It took him some time, but Josh finally shaved his body fully smooth. He decided to shave his chest hair as well, as it looked ridiculous with his now bare arms and didn't want his mom to complain.
He looked into the mirror and saw his body now devoid of hair, which he wasn't used to at all.
As he was admiring his work, his mom entered the bathroom once again and had an approving expression on her face.

"I'm glad to see you actually working with me here." She said as she laid down some stuff on a nearby shelf.
"Of course, I mean I did swap clothes with Jenn and I should face the consequences of it, might as well just embrace it instead of fighting it." Josh said, causing his mother to smile.
"Glad to hear you say that, but I expected you to do this, so I've come up with something." She declared.
"Tell me." Josh said curiously.
"If you behave tomorrow and wear the clothes I picked for you, I may allow you to choose your own clothes at home." This caused Josh to start smiling.
"But, you will still wear a nice skirt to school, that will not change." She clarified.
"Sure mom, thanks!" Josh said smiling.
"But only if you behave, if you don't I'll still choose for you." She said with a stern voice.
"Yes mom, I understand."

"Now here, put these on." She said as she handed him a pile of clothes. "I still want you to try them on for now so I know how they look and fit on you."
Josh looked over the pile, there was a nice matching bra to his panties, there was a short denim skirt and a nice white blouse.
"Could you teach me how to put this on?" Josh asked as he grabbed the bra, being met with an approving nod from his mother.
His mom helped Josh put on the bra, afterwards he put on the tight denim skirt and white blouse, which were also of course in Jenn's size, but they seemed to fit him pretty well.

"You look quite cute Courtney." His mom nodded in approval.
"Are we done for now?" Josh asked hoping his mom was done.
"For now, but you will keep that on the rest of the day."
"Understood." Josh said as he went back to his room, feeling the tight denim skirt on his hips.
His now smooth legs were showing underneath it and surprisingly looked fairly feminine, just not as skinny or shapely. The blouse wasn't very comfortable for Josh, but he could bare with it. He did admire the way the skirt felt on his smooth legs as he felt them up a little bit.
"That's enough of that for now, but if I stay on mom's good side this may be bearable after all." Josh sighed.
11211111212133123223311.title: Kim makes Josh shave his legs and underarms

choices: Josh begs Courtney to swap rooms
To get out of his punishment, Josh tells MOm of his swapping abilities
112111112121331232233114.content:
Josh hoped that this would be all over soon. He would just have to ride out the punishment and that would be it.. His mom was bluffing, she wouldn't make him go to school dressed as he was. She made him wear a skirt with a sleeveless blouse at home with heels and pantyhose to get him all scared. But in the morning she wouldn't make him go to school like this. All he had to do was get his voice and name back from Courtney and everything would be fine. Courtney better not give him too much guff or he wouldn't tell her that she is wearing the apparel of an eight year old and she would be stuck that way (without realizing it for life.)

Bri entered the room breaking his train of thought.

"What are you doing here?"

"Why shouldn't I be here?" Bri asked incredulously.

Josh had forgotten that he now shared a room with his little sister. It was all forgotten with all that had happened. All in all that seemed like the least important swap. "I'm sorry," Josh said. "I guess I'm having a bad day."

"I see. Why are you dressed like that? If you want to dress like a girl you could just swap. Can't you?"

"I'm being punished. Mom is making me."

"What did you do?"

"Nothing, Mom is just being...well she is being Mom. Everything will be OK soon." Bri found something to play with. She asked if Josh wanted to play with her. But Josh said he had to talk to 'Josh' first. He wanted to return to normal as soon as he could. He had a name, voice and room he needed to swap.

Finding Courtney in Josh's former room, Courtney broke out laughing when she saw how Josh was dressed.

"Have a good laugh. It's time to swap back."

"Says who?"

"Says me. Don't you want your name and voice back?"

"I guess."

"Good then we'll swap name, voice and rooms." For laughing at him, Josh wouldn't tell her how ridiculous Courtney looked in the clothes of her sister. Although it was true that Josh did look more ridiculous.

"Well name and voice OK, but I haven't had a room to myself for a full day. I'll keep that for a week."

"No not that long. Let's swap now."

"We have to agree."

Courtney had him over a barrel. Maybe he could negotiate. "How about over night?"

"No a week."

"Two days?"

"Three days."

"Two days is enough. Besides what about Bri, she should be in her room with her sister not older brother."

"OK, two days.."

"Fine let's swap names and voices."

"I agree."

After the flash, nothing seemed to change. Courtney said, "Did it work?" in her own voice.

"Yes it did," Josh said. "Now remember in two days I get my room back."

Josh returned to the room he shared with Bri. He was truly Josh again, he would be back to normal in only a couple days then he would have to be more careful about his swaps. Bri was playing. He put in his ear phones and started to listen to music.

Time passed. Then without warning, Bri started to strip right in front of him. She had never done that before. Not since she was a very little girl anyway.

"Whatcha doing?"

"It's almost bed time."

Bri and Courtney bed time wasn't too dissimilar as they were close in age. But Josh was almost double Bri's age and didn't need to be in bed until at least 11. What was he going to do for three hours? Should he just listen to music in the dark? Should he go to sleep himself? Should he go to the living room and watch TV, assuming no one else was there?

Bri was stripping out of her panties. Josh looked away, but he was embarrassed for her. She shouldn't be changing in front of her brother. But since they shared a room this was obviously common now.

Then Josh remembered, Mom said he could take off his bra when he was going to bed. The bra was beginning to itch. He found a pair of pajamas and took them to the bathroom to change.

What happens next?
112111112121331232233114.title: Josh gets to relax for now.

choices: "Joshie, it's past your bed time," Kim said
Josh takes a stuffed bear with him as he leaves the room
1121111121213312322331141.content:
It wasn't quite Bri's bedtime when Josh received a phone call from Jenn. Bri was in the bathroom brushing her teeth and getting ready for bed when the call arrived.

"Hey Josh," Jenn said brightly.

"Hey Jenn."

"Now that I know that your name is not Josh I'm having a hard time calling you that. I mean I know you swapped names with your sister so you should be Courtney, but I remember that your name has always been Josh. It's so confusing, if you know what I mean."

"Stop over thinking this. You don't have to worry about it anymore. I swapped back with Courtney. I'm back to Josh now."

"That is what I always thought your name was. But you said you had swapped."

"I did swap but I swapped back. It's back to normal."

"So you are back to sleeping with Bri and this is your normal voice too?"

"Well the voice is back to my own, but Courtney won't swap rooms yet. She says she'll swap back in a couple of days. I can wait until then.

"What if she won't swap?"

"Don't say a thing like that," Josh said. He didn't want to think about what would happen if this was permanent. Although, as far as changes went, he supposed sharing a room with Bri was better than having his sister''s voice or being called Courtney for a lifetime. Not that Courtney didn't have a nice voice, she could sing beautifully. He just didn't want to sound like a girl.

"Anyway, I called to ask how it's going."

"I'm wearing your nightgown. That is how it's going," Josh said sarcastically.

"I'm imagining you in my nightgown...wait which one is it, the cute red one with all that lace?"

It was at this time that Bri returned from the bathroom. Josh didn't want her to hear what he was talking to Jenn about. "One second," Josh said to Jenn on the phone and then held the phone to his chest so she couldn't hear what he was saying. Then directing himself to Bri, Josh said, "Hey Bri I could use a snack before bedtime. Can you get us some Pizza Rolls?"

"Sure."

Josh needed for her to take a little while so he and Jenn could talk. "One more thing, can you make them in the oven? They come out better that way."

"I can't. You know Mommy won't let me turn on the oven."

That was true, Mom wouldn't let her touch the oven. She thought that she was too young. "I'll tell you what, I'll swap with you our apparent maturity. Then mom will let you use the oven. I'm sure you can do it. It's easy to use the oven, Josh knew that Bri would be fine.

"OK, let's swap."

"I agree to swapping my maturity," Josh said and after the flash, Bri left the room. Josh didn't realize that his clothing had changed. Not at first, then when he looked down he found he wasn't in a nightgown. He was wearing a pair of boys pajamas. They weren't the ones he remembered having. They were for a much younger boy, but they were at least male clothing.

Back to Jenn on the phone, "Hey, I'm back."

"Joshie, your back?"

"Yes, I'm back to wearing guys clothing."

"Of course you are. You are such a silly billy."

"Let me check the stuff in my closet." Josh carried the phone with him and he looked into his drawers. Nothing of Jenn remained. All his clothes were for a young boy. He didn't know what had happened. He didn't swap clothing with any little boys. There weren't any little boys around to swap with.

"Are you wearing boys clothes?"

"No, of course not. Why would I do that?"

"Do you know of any punishment I'm having?"

"Have you been a naughty boy?"

"I guess not. Look, I'll see you are school tomorrow, Bye" Josh said and then hung up the phone.

Jenn was confused. Josh didn't go to her high school. He was in grammar school.

Josh needed to talk to his mother and see if he was still being punished. Something had changed and he didn't know what it was.

Josh left his room to find his mother.

What happens next.
1121111121213312322331141.title: Josh swaps bedtimes with Bri

choices: Sorry, but my mom is calling for me.
1121111121213312322331144.content:
Bri was just about in bed when Josh's phone started to ring.
"Crap!" Josh thought not wanting to wake up Bri, but it was too late as she had already woken up.
"Just take the call in the living room like usual and let me sleep." Bri complained.
"Uhh yeah sure." Josh said as he got to the living room.
His mom was still upstairs doing whatever as Josh took the call and saw it was Jenn.

"Hey Jenn." Josh said feeling relieved to have his male voice back after swapping with Courtney.
"Hey Josh, just wanted to call to see how you were doing, my mom just picked out my clothes for tomorrow, but she had some difficulty choosing something from your wardrobe." Jenn said almost laughing.
"You'll be much better off than me, my mom picked out a skirt and blouse for me to wear." He said with a soft voice hearing Jenn giggling madly.
"Oh my gosh, I can't wait to see you in my clothes tomorrow." She said still giggling.
"I bet."
"Anyway, I was also going to ask, are you sure your name isn't Josh originally? I couldn't imagine you being called Courtney."
"The swap does alter reality for everyone to think it's normal, but I already swapped back names with my sister just a bit ago, so my name is Josh again, not Courtney anymore." Josh said finally smiling again.
"Now you're confusing me, anyway so your name really is Josh like it's supposed to then." Jenn said confused.
"You got it."

"Oh Josh, now that you have swapped back names with Courtney, you only still have her voice and room right?" Jenn asked.
"I swapped back voices as well, will swap back rooms in few days." Josh corrected.
"Then, you almost have nothing swapped anymore!" Jenn said excitedly.
"True, but why are you getting so excited?" Josh asked suspiciously.
"Then we can swap something between ourselves!" Jenn said hoping Josh would agree.
"I don't know Jenn."
"Come on, I can even swap something with you to help you cope with the punishment?" Jenn suggested.
Josh thought about it for a minute before saying....
1121111121213312322331144.title: Reader's choice

choices: Josh wants to make a new outfit suggestion for school to his mom.
Josh starts to feel uncomfortable with his male body.
11211111212133123223311442.content:
"Let's swap something mental for now." Josh said, much to Jenn's surprise.
"Something mental, you sure?" Jenn asked with a happy tone.
"Yeah, something to help us in this situation, but also let us experience something interesting about each other." Josh suggested.

"So something like clothing preference?" Jenn suggested.
"That would be the safest option, would help us deal with each other's clothes without messing us up too badly." Josh said approving.
"But it isn't as exciting as something a little bigger, I kind of want to swap our personalities." Jenn said trying to convince Josh.
"I'm not sure about that." Josh said nervously.
"Oh come on Josh, please, for me!" Jenn said almost begging as Josh could just imagine her puppy eyes staring at him."

"Fine, I want to swap personalities with you Jenn." Josh eventually said reluctantly.
"I agree!" She said immediately as the swap took place.

"Did it work?" Jenn suddenly said in a calm tone.
Josh looked down at his outfit, he loved Jenn's blouse on his chest now, as well as the cute skirt he was wearing. He started to think of how thankful he was for his mom to force him to shave his legs, they would have spoiled the look.
Suddenly, Josh realizes that due to the swap, he was now very comfortable with Jenn's clothes.

"Oh it definitely worked, your outfit seems so much cuter to me now." Josh said with some pep to his tone.
"You didn't before?" Jenn teased him.
"I liked your jeans when we swapped before, but I wasn't comfortable in your skirt, until now." Josh said.
"I knew you loved wearing my jeans before, looks like you are not so manly as you thought you were, even before the swap, now you definitely aren't" Jenn teased Josh as she was grinning.
"I guess not." Josh giggled like Jenn used to when she was embarrassed.

"So for how long do you want to keep our personalities swapped?" Jenn asks.
"Until after our punishment I think, I prefer enjoying the clothes I have to wear." Josh said giggling still.
"Sounds good to me." Jenn said seeming happy with the suggestion.
"I am worried about one thing however." Josh said suddenly.
"What about?" Jenn asked.
"If I enjoy wearing your clothes like this, what are the chances our parents won't let us swap back?" Josh said a bit worried.
"Don't worry Josh, it'll be fine, if they do decide to do that we can always swap back personalities before." Jenn tried to calm down Josh.
"I guess you're right, but if I do have to wear your clothes without your personality, you'll owe me." Josh declared with his hands on his hips, even if Jenn couldn't see him.
"Sure thing." Jenn replied slightly nervous.

"I have to go, see you tomorrow at school." Josh said.
"Can't wait." Jenn said thinking about the embarrassment they could have to face tomorrow.
They both hung up and Josh finally felt comfortable in Jenn's skirt, which made him feel happy about the personality swap, at least for now.
11211111212133123223311442.title: Let's swap something mental.

11211111212133123223311444.content:
"You really want to swap something? I mean with all the trouble it's been already?" Josh asked..

"Hey you aren't being punished because you and I swapped. Well we did swap but not the way you mean," Jenn replied.

"We did swap, don't you remember."

"But that was before I knew about your swapping ability. That was sort of by accident. I want to swap something on purpose. But I promise to swap something that will make it easier on both of us."

"Like what?"

"I'm thinking."

"Josh can you come here?" Kim Josh's mom called from the living room.

"OK, I'll agree to anything you say. But Mom is calling me. I'd better see what she wants." Josh put down the phone and headed towards his mother's voice. His mother was obviously in a foul mood and he didn't want to upset her anymore. Tomorrow he was going to go to school in a skirt and blouse if she didn't change her mind. “I think we should swap responsibilities!” Leah said excitedly. “It’s so boring being alone all day and the chores I have scheduled for the week get really repetitive. With this I could I finally spend time with my friends and really enjoy the life I have, can we please do it?”

With that said there was a bright flash that covered the room and slowly dimmed down.

“I don’t feel any different.” Leah said as she looked at herself and then back at Josh. “Are you sure it worked?”

“Trust me it wor-“Josh was cut off by the buzz of his cellphone. As he checked it he noticed it was a message from Leah’s husband reminding him about the chores he was assigned for tomorrow. “aw man this seems like a lot. How am I going to finish all of this in one day?”

Leah couldn’t help herself from giggling as she checked her phone. “It seems like my husbanded wanted me to remind you as well while I’m here. Apparently that message was sent earlier In the day and you never responded back. He was worried you might be taking a sick day tomorrow.”

“Sick day?” Kim asked a bit confused by the new reality.

“Yup! It seems like Josh is our new maid. I always wanted one since we had the money to afford it but my husband always preferred my touch when it came to these type of things. I’m so happy that I can finally get away for a while, thank you so much Josh!” Leah said as she gave josh a big hug. “You have a busy day tomorrow so we should get this done as soon as possible so you can rest.”

While Josh and Leah were hugging, Kim’s friends stared in shock and amazement. They were each skeptical of what Kim had promised but now after seeing the power Josh possessed in action they could hardly contain their excitement. Each of them were already planning what they wanted from Josh in order to fulfill their own selfish desires.

Josh pulled out of the hug and begrudgingly asked aloud who the next person was. He was already regretting what he had gotten himself into. He assumed the tasks Leah was complaining about were exaggerations and wouldn’t be as bad as Leah described but now he was stuck doing them all for a week.

“It seems like I’m the next one up” said……

"No, now it's dividing. My brother helped me with the multiplying." Bri told her.

"Well that's really sweet of him!" She said, which made Josh blush back in his own room.

He decided that was enough listening for that moment, so he got his mane of hair under control, tucking some behind his ears, and grabbed a controller.
11221.title: Jenn is looking for Bri

112211.content:
Josh opened his eyes for the first time of the day,but at first couldn't see anything due to his new long brown hair covering his face. After he cleared his hair out of his face, he decided to go find his sister. He wanted to fix his hair, as he was tired of it always being out of control. He went to her room, which had the door open. He saw his youngest sister inside, while Courtney was nowhere to be found even though she shared the room with Bri.

"Hey Joshie!" She said. "You want to make another swap before I leave for the game?"

"No thanks." He replied. "I wanted to know if you could get my hair to stop moving and get it under control.

"Here." Said Bri, patting the chair in front of the mirror where she put her makeup on. "I can try something."

Josh sat down and his sister went to work, after about ten seconds, she had pulled his hair back into a ponytail.

"Is that better?" She asked.

Josh got up and found that his hair no longer got in his way when he moved. "Perfect!" He exclaimed.

"Good. Glad I could help." Bri assured him. "It's the least I could do for you when you let me borrow your hair for the big game."

Josh went downstairs and hopped on the couch to watch some TV, where he switched to the Comedy Central channel. He saw Courtney was eating breakfast in the kitchen, where Kim was getting drinks together for Bri during her game. After a few minutes, Bri came down and entered the kitchen. "Ready to go sweetie?" Josh heard his mom ask the youngest Mitchell.

"Yes ma'am!" She said excitedly.

"Josh and Courtney, I'm taking Bri to her game. We won't be back for awhile, especially if she wins because then there will then be a team party." She said. "That means it's just you two, so be good!"

"Bye mom!" Josh said, while Courtney waved as Kim and Bri left the kitchen, and eventually they were outside and in the car.

After about ten minutes, Courtney entered the room, where Josh was still sitting on the couch watching Comedy Central. "Hey big bro!" She said. "Do you mind if I watch with you?"

"No, not at all." He told her.

While they continued to watch Courtney tried to start some kind of a conversation. "Well I see you finally got your hair in a ponytail." She said laughing.

"Yeah. Bri helped me with it." Josh replied.

"Speaking of her, I wonder how her game will go." Courtney said, realizing there would be a team party if she won, meaning she could have so more peace and quiet.

"I think she'll win." Josh said, hoping that it would happen for the good of his sister. "She's definitely gonna play better now that she has my shorter hair which will stay out of her way." Josh immediately cussed himself out quietly for spilling his secret swap with his sister.

"She has what!?!?" Courtney asked.

Josh panicked and tried to come up with something to trick her sister. "Umm... I said she would take better care of the ball." Emphasizing the care so his sister would think he meant that instead of hair.

"That's not what you said." Courtney told him, not buying his desperate escape. Now tell me what you meant by Bri having your hair and don't lie."

Josh explained everything to his sister, including the hair and friend swaps. He told her about the old woman that first gave him the power, and how Bri found out.

"How come I didn't notice that you have Bri's hair then?" Courtney asked intrigued.

"I think my power makes the people around us think we've always been like this." He told her, even though he wasn't exactly sure how or why.

"Can we make a swap?" Courtney said, which surprised Josh because he didn't think she would believe him.

"I don't really want to right now." Josh told her.

"Oh come on! You'll swap with Bri and not me?" She questioned, annoyed at the fact he was excluding her.

"No, it just that I've already swapped two things and I don't want to swap any more."

"Well, I was just going to ask if you would swap Bri's hair with mine." Said Courtney. "You would still only have swapped two things.

"Why would you want to do that?" He asked. He didn't see any reason he would do that anyway because he was gonna swap back with Bri later anyway.

"Two reasons. One, I'm tired of people calling me a ginger. I'm a strawberry blonde. Two, Bri's hair is still long like girls normally have it." She explained.

"I don't know if I should." Josh told her.

"Also, I can tell your long hair bothers you. At least mine is a bit shorter." His sister said, trying to convince him.

Josh thought she had a point. He would like shorter hair, and even if it was still longer than his, it wouldn't be as bad as having Bri's. He also realized that since everyone else didn't notice the swaps between him and Bri, it was possible that a third swap would make her think Courtney's hair was hers, and she would swap back with him anyway.

"Okay fine. I agree to swap hair with you." He said, after the flash of light returned for a quick moment, Josh saw that Courtney now had Bri's longer brown hair cascading down to her back, while Josh's hair was stop still pulled back into a ponytail. Howeverthere wasn't as much hair pulled back now.

"Yay!" Courtney squealed and hugged Josh. "Thank you!" She never asked about whether Bri would want her hair back or not, and Josh figured that she didn't really care. That was fine with him, as it would allow him to carry out his plan later that night.

"Okay..." Josh trailed off. "I think I'm going to play some PlayStation." He started to leave.

"Wait!" Courtney said. "Can we please make another swap."

Josh knew it would come to this, which was why he tried to leave. "I told you sis, I don't want to make more than two swaps at once."

"I'll give you my allowance for next week." She blurted out. This seemed to interest Josh, as he was trying to save up for a new video game that was coming out in the next few weeks.

"Okay, what do you want to swap?" Asked Josh.

"Before I tell you, you have to agree to swap until I give you the money from my allowance that night." She said, wanting to try and get a decent amount of time with the swap.

Josh thought about it. The day was currently Saturday, and the Mitchell kids got their allowance every Thursday, which meant that counting the rest of the day, they would be swapped for six days. "Deal." He finally agreed, he really wanted that new game. "Now do you want?"

"I want you to swap our _____." Said Courtney, which immediately made Josh regret agreeing to the deal.

Not much happened the rest of the time that Bri was at her game for Josh. Most of his new friends were probably playing in Bri's game, so he didn't really have anybody to get together with. Courtney left him alone for the most part, likely exploring her new member. Josh hadn't started doing the same yet though, as he didn't think he was ready yet. Especially because the female parts he had were his sister's!

Bri hadn't returned for awhile, which Josh had to guess was because they won and had a team party. This left Josh a few hours of quiet time for him to play video games in peace. As he played, one thing he noticed was that he could cross his legs comfortably without his private parts getting in the way. He was fascinated with this comfort and would remain in that position for longer periods of time.

Finally, after a few hours of playing Josh heard the front door open. He looked over at the clock and saw it was 5:38 PM. Josh didn't really bother to pause his game to go greet them, so he just turned his focus back to the game. After a little over 5 more minutes of playing, someone opened his door and the person who walked in was none other than Bri. "Hey big bro!" She said, sitting down on his bed.

"Hey Bri, did you win your game?"

"Yep! And I played well because you helped me with my hair. I scored two goals and we won by two!"

Bri seemed happy but she didn't mention anything about Josh's change in hair length and/or color. Josh knew at this point in the conversation that there was no way Bri couldn't have noticed. He had to guess that the change in reality with him now having Courtney's hair caused Bri to think that Courtney's strawberry blonde hair has actually hers!

"Anyway, are you ready to swap our hair back?" She asked.

Josh thought about telling Bri the truth about his second hair swap, but he saw no point, as he was starting to long for having his signature short hair style again. Bri did think Courtney's old hair was haters anyway. "What's the worst that could happen? Swapping the hair of my sisters around isn't going to kill them!" He thought. Plus, like Courtney told him earlier, it was best to keep himself on Bri's good side as long as they were swapped. "Yeah, I'm ready." He told her, but nothing happened. "I agree." Headded before the flash came in, proving his second phrase a success. He has glad to have his short hairstyle, as well as his body and facial hair back. Bri on the other hand, looked odd to Josh with Courtney's hair, which was still in a ponytail.

"Also Josh, I'll give your friends back too since you helped me. I can imagine you were bored with no friends to hang with today. But only as long as we can make another swap after."

Missing his friends, Josh agreed to the terms. The two siblings went on to swap back friends as well, before Bri broke the silence.

"Okay, now I want to swap our ______." Bri said.

"Okay, now I want to swap our smartness." Bri said.

She sounded confident, but he took a glance anyway. The only problem was that he couldn't tell if they were right or not! In fact, he had no idea how to solve them!

"I think the swap worked. I don't know if you got the answers right or not, but I have no idea how to do them, so I know we swapped."

"Awesome! Thank you!" Bri said giving Josh a big hug.

Bri's excitement was reminding Josh of when they had swapped friends. "This is giving me some... ahh never mind." Josh said, not being able to think of the word he was looking for.

"I guess so, I don't know."

Josh was sitting in his room gaming in his PlayStation, doing the same thing he was twenty four hours before. A difference he noticed playing was he no longer had any friends on his console, which he figured out was because Bri took them all. She did do something good for him as well though. Bri put Josh's hair up into a ponytail before she left for her game. That meant that Josh's day wasn't affected as much. His hair wasn't a problem and none of his new friends were around, as they were all playing alongside Bri in the championship game. That allowed Josh to just relax for the day, after a pretty eventful Friday.

Finally, Bri returned home near 7 PM as Kim drove her home after watching her game. When the door opened, Josh could hear his mom call down to him. "Josh! Come down here I need your help!" He paused his game and found his mom downstairs with the door still open, her hands were full as she was carrying a few bags that Josh guessed were unrelated to the game. "Go out and carry Bri's trophy up to her room. It's heavy so be careful." Josh went around to the back of the car and saw one of the biggest trophies he had ever seen.

Josh reached to grab the trophy but he saw his sister peak out from the side. "Hey Josh!" She said happily. "How was your day with my hair?"

"Nothing out of the ordinary." He replied. "The ponytail helped a ton, so thanks."

"No problem." Bri said. "It was the least I could do for you considering you let me borrow your hair."

"So I'm guessing you won the championship game?" Josh asked picking up the trophy out of the trunk. He noticed it was certainly heavy. It had to be at least 60 pounds, which his youngest sister could certainly not carry. He now knew why his mom called him outside.

"Uh huh." She said.

"And they gave every girl on your team on your team a trophy this big and heavy?"

"No. This was the trophy they gave to every player." She revealed a smaller trophy in her hand that was probably twice the size of Bri's hand but easy to carry. "That's the Most Valuable Player trophy. I scored three goals including the game winner."

"Nice!" Josh said giving her a high five. He had to put a knee underneath the trophy when he freed one hand so he didn't drop it.

They started to walk back toward the house, and Josh curiosily asked about the game "So tell me how you scored the last goal." He said.

"Well, Jenna was dribbling the ball down the field, and she passed it to me, and I was free so I kicked the ball in straight past the goalie!" She explained in a very excited manner. "Thanks to your hair, because my hair would've gotten in the way and I would've missed the kick."

"That sounds awesome!" Josh told her.

"Plus, it finally made the girls excited for me again!" She added, as they approached the stairs.

"Wait what do you mean?" Josh said, as he stopped walking and put the trophy down on the first step.

"Oh I forgot to mention that. Didn't I?" She asked as Josh responded with a nod.

"Well, since we swapped friends last night, none of the girls on my team really knew me anymore." She explained.

"Oh... Josh trailed off. "Well I'm sorry to hear that."

"It's okay." She said. "Because after I scored the winning goal, all of the girls treated me like normal and they were nice to me at the team party."

Josh was happy to hear that at first, but then he realized something else. "Wait... That means that even when we swap back friends I'm still gona be friends with your friends?" He asked while picking up the trophy again and wondering how that was going to work.

"Yep!" Bri laughed and giggled as Josh frowned. As they made it to the top of the stairs, Bri told Josh to follow her. "Here, let's go to your room first. I'll give you your hair back like we talked about."

"Good idea." Josh said in agreement. Bri opened the door for him, as he put the trophy down just inside of his room next to his door. His sister sat on his bed. "Okay Bri, do you agree to swap our hair back?" He asked.

"Yes, I agree." She said. And with that, there was the familiar flash of light once again, as Josh now had his short hair again, while Bri's long, brown hair was returned to her. Bri stood up, but then came up with an idea. She turned to Josh. "Before I leave Joshie, can we make another swap?"

Josh didn't really want to, but he figured that since she still had her friends it was best to keep her happy so she would swap back eventually. "Sure, but only one swap." He told her.

"Okay..." Bri said thinking, before coming up with an answer about fifteen seconds later. "Let's swap our ______." She said.

I'll take that smaller trophy for you." Their mom picked it up and went to take it to Courtney and Bri's room.

With that taken care of, Jossie decided to call up her friend Jenn to see if their friendship was different at all now that they were both girls.

"Hey Jossie!" Jenn greeted her enthusiastically upon picking up. "What's up?"

"Not much," Jossie replied, finally getting a bit used to her new voice. "Just wanted to see what you were up to."

"Not much here either. I got all my homework done for the weekend so I'm just bored. Wanna come over?"

"I can't," Jossie replied. "I gotta watch ... Brian." She paused for a second just to make sure she said the right name.

"Oh, that's no problem. I'll just come over there!"

"Sounds good," Jossie agreed before hanging up. She wasn't quite sure, but it seemed that Jenn was a bit more excited to talk to her now that she was a girl. Not thinking much of it, she waited for her friend to show up.

Not too much later, the doorbell rang, and Jossie opened the door to see Jenn, who immediately gave her a hug. Jossie happily reciprocated the hug. Even though she was a girl now, she still had a crush on her longtime friend and was glad that she was more touchy with her now that they were both girls.

"So what do you wanna do?" Jenn asked.

The first thing that popped into Jossie's mind was her power. She wondered if she should tell her friend about it. She figured it would be more fun to swap with her than Brian ... but on the other hand, she was overwhelmed enough with the gender swap and wasn't sure if she wanted to swap anything else.

Jossie just smiled sheepishly. "I knew it," Jenn said smugly. "Studying first it is!"

The two headed up to Jossie's room and got set up to study. As Jossie was finishing out her Biology textbook from her bag, she looked back to see Jenn staring at her shapely new butt encased in her yoga pants, but thought nothing of it.

As they were studying, however, Jossie began to notice differences in Jenn's behavior. She noticed that when Jenn leaned over her shoulder to help her, she would lean much closer and make much more physical contact. She also caught her staring at her breasts a couple times. That's when something occurred to Jossie. Was Jenn gay? Suddenly, everything seemed to make sense. Why Jenn made it clear she had only seen Josh as a friend, why she always seemed evasive when asked about boys and who she was attracted too, why she was suddenly acting so different now that Josh was Jossie.

Even after they finished studying and put the movie on, these thoughts were filling Jossie's head. Even though she was a girl now, she was definitely still attracted to girls and she definitely still had a crush on Jenn. This was her chance to finally be with her.

At that moment, the two happened to lock eyes as they both reached for the popcorn, and Jenn had that same flushed look on her face. Jossie decided to go for it and leaned in for a kiss. As their lips made contact, Jenn's eyes went wide with surprise, but then she relaxed and let it happen.

This was a moment that Jossie had often dreamed of, she just never thought she'd be a girl when it happened.

Breaking off the kiss, the two stared into each other's eyes for several moments, neither sure what to do next.

1122122.content:
"What!?!?" Josh asked surprised. "Why do you want that?"

"I want to be as strong as my big brother!" She told him.

Josh thought about the proposal, even though Bri would gain something physical from him, nothing about his physical build would actually change. "Alright, but tomorrow is Sunday, I want it back either tomorrow night or first thing Monday morning."

"Yay!" Bri said happily. "So you'll do it?"

"Yes, I agree to swap strength with you." Josh said, hoping he wouldn't regret it. There was once again a flash, but this time, nothing looked different about him or his sister.

"Did it work?" She asked.

"I dunno." Josh said. "We didn't swap anything physical so we would have to test it."

"How do we test?" Bri said, looking around her brother's room for an answer.

"I think you should try lifting up your big trophy." Josh told her.

"Okay! I'll try." Bri walked over to her Most Valuable Player trophy, and what happened next amazed Josh, his eight year old sister was lifting something that almost weighed as much as her with no problem! "Wow! This is so cool!" Bri said, starting to walk out, still holding her trophy pretty easily. "Hey Josh, can you grab that smaller trophy for me?" She asked.

Josh picked up the trophy and noticed something. Even though he picked up the smaller trophy with no problem, he was using a lot more effort that he felt he wouldn't need under normal circumstances. Then, it hit him. He now had the strength of an eight year old girl. "Well, I better be careful while carrying and holding things tomorrow." He told himself.

When he got to Bri's room, Josh saw her put the trophy down gently on her dresser. "That was awesome!" She told her brother, as he put the smaller trophy down next to the big one. Despite having no trouble carrying the generally decent-sized trophy, it still tired his muscles a bit.

Josh was prepared to leave and go back to playing PlayStation, but he had one more question for his sister. "Hey Bri, can we also swap back friends sometime before school on Monday too? I don't want to have to go to school with no friends."

"Yeah I guess so." She said, even though it was obvious she didn't want to do that. Bri knew her brother had a point.

Josh then left to go play his video games again, only he now has his normal hair back and he was a lot weaker.

"Let's swap our maturity." She said.

"Well mom's always telling me I need to be 'more mature', or I 'need some more maturity'. She never talks to you about it, so I thought I swap it for yours." She explained.

"No not really." Josh answered.

"Okay, that's fine. But if you change your mind come let me know." She told him as she walked out.

Know that Josh was alone he just decided to play some video games. After about 5 minutes of demolishing fellow gamers online, he heard his mom call upstairs. "Kids, I just remembered I left something at the dental office. I'm gonna quickly go grab it and I shouldn't be anymore than half an hour." Bri's in charge.

This surprising decision mad Josh really frustrated. He ran out of his room and near the stairs. "Why is Bri in charge?!? I'm the oldest!" He whined like a little.

"She's the most mature, she'll be able to handle whatever goes wrong." Kim explained before blowing him a kiss and walking out the door.

Josh finally realized what the maturity swap with his little sister had done to him, he marched back to his room to pout for a couple of minutes before resuming with his games.

11222.content:
"Jenna is here looking for you, Josh. She's waiting downstairs." Kim said before starting return downstairs to do the laundry.

Josh was not expecting his mom to say that and tried to play it off cool when she said it. "Okay mom, tell her I'll be downstairs in a couple of minutes."

"Don't be too long. You don't want to keep your friend waiting."

Bri could tell that there was something wrong when she saw a worried look on his face. "What's wrong big bro?" She said, trying to hold back some laughter.

"I don't want to hang out with your friend! We have nothing in common and I don't know how to be friends with an 8 year old girl!" Josh complained in a panic.

"I know how we can fix that!" Bri beamed.

"You do?" Josh asked, hoping his sister would suggest swapping friends back.

"Yep! We can swap the things we like so you can enjoy Jenna's favorite things more."

"Like interests?"

"Uh huh, that's the word I was thinking about."

Josh really did not like the sound of that, but it was either the extra swap or spending time with Bri's friend having no common interests. And he had to choose quickly, not wanting to keep Jenna waiting. "I guess it's not the worst idea..."

"Is that a yes or a no?" Bri questioned, eagerly waiting for an answer.

"Sure, I'll swap interests with you." There was a new flash that followed. Like the friends swap, there was nothing different physically about him or Bri. However, Josh immediately knew the swap worked because his attitude about Jenna's arrival had went from a feeling of negativity to excitement. Also, he was about to start playing video games before his new friend came, now he had to urge to go outside and kick the ball around with her. To top it off, his interest in watching that movie with Jenn had turned into watching some Disney Channel later on.

"See ya later sis!" Josh said in a hurry to find his friend.

"Wait!" Josh heard his sister say before he left the room. He turned around to face her. "Do you mind if I play your video games while your with Jenna?"

"I don't see why not, I don't even feel like playing them anyway." He said, tucking some rouge hairs behind his ear and making a dash to find his friend.

Josh was a bit disappointed to see Jenn leave, but he was still in a good mood. "Wow! That was so much fun!" He said to himself before he heard his mom call him and his siblings for dinner. The actual dinner went by normally, with Josh and Bri hardly talking to each other, and not saying a word about their swaps. Most of the talking came from Kim gathering information from each one of her kids on how their school day went. Courtney seemed to have been in a rush, as she was the first one to finish her dinner, which was a rarity. She then quickly excused herself and retreated to the room she and Bri shared. Josh had to guess she was texting with her friends or something of that matter. Kim, also in a rush, finished her dinner second and excused herself to take care of some louds of laundry.

That left just Josh and Bri, the latter of the two made sure they were in the clear before igniting conversation. "So, how was hanging out with Jenna?"

"It was a ton of fun!" Josh said eagerly, and then went through every last detail about his time with his new friend. "What did you do while I was with Jenna?" He asked after finishing, placing some of his rouge hairs behind his ear.

"I tried to play your video games, but I wasn't any good." She said sadly. "They looked like a ton of fun though."

"Well, maybe I could give you my skills. You would be able to play my games with ease then."

"Really? You would do that for me?"

"I'll do it, under one condition."

"And what's that?"

"I want to try playing in your soccer game tomorrow. I think it'll be a lot of fun. Can you give me your place on the team?"

"Yeah sure, I don't even feel like playing tomorrow anyway."

Josh and Bri completed two more swaps, the first of which gave Bri his video game skills. Josh couldn't remember how to play any of his games, not that he cares anyway. Now though, Josh had a better understanding of how to play soccer, which although unintended, would actually help him after he made the next swap. The second one gave Josh his sister's role on her soccer team, which was how he could put his new soccer skills to the test.

"Is that all?" Bri asked.

"One more thing. Since you're not playing in the soccer game tomorrow, you have no use for borrowing my hair. Can we swap that back?"

"I don't really want to, but sure. It could help you in the game tomorrow."

The light filled the kitchen, which would mark the last time the flash visited for the night. Josh had his shorter hair back, and Bri's longer hair descended down her back again.

"Alright, I'm going to go play video games." Bri said before bolting up the stairs. Josh looked around and found the living room unoccupied, he decided to go watch some Disney Channel on the couch.

Josh had just sat down in front of the TV and turned on the Disney Channel when Bri came bounding down the stairs again.

"Josh can you help me?"

"What is it this time?"

"Your video game system is in your room. I need you to help me set it up in my room."

"Why is that?"

"Mom said she didn't want me to play in your room. She wants me back in my room."

"Oh great," Josh whined to himself. It'll take about twenty minutes to remove the connection in his room and then move it to her room. He would miss half his show. Then he would have to undo it later when they swapped back. This seemed like too much of a hassle.

"Well would you do it for me?"

"I have a better idea, let's just swap rooms. Then you can play with it in your room."

"That wouldn't work. You know how this thing is. IF we swap, then all your stuff will be swapped into my room and vice versa."

"I guess you are right." Josh thought he would have to do it manually. Then he came up with another idea.

"How about we swap rooms and you can have anything you want from my room. Then we'll swap back later. That'll work."

"Yes it will. Let's swap." The usually flash of light appeared and Bri left immediately. Josh was happy.

Josh spend hours watching TV. All the shows were new to him and he liked them. But as it got later, the Disney shows were for a mature audience. Not for an adult, but they were shows designed for middle school and younger high school children. He changed the channel from the Disney Channel to Disney Jr Channel. he liked these shows much better.

When he was ready, he returned upstairs to swap back. But he found that Bri had gone to sleep. She was still eight and had a bedtime at 8:30. He couldn't swap back with her when she was asleep. She couldn't agree to anything. So he went to what was now his room which he shared with Courtney.

Inside he found that it was not indeed his room. There were toys and dolls that hadn't been in his room before, but now they were part of his interests so they should be in his room now. But his half of the room did have a male color scheme as well as the comforter on what was his bed. In the closets and drawers were his clothing. He felt right at home here, except that Courtney was in the room too. He had always had a bedroom alone. He was the only boy and the oldest. But that didn't matter anymore, he now shared his room with his kid sister.

He got into bed. Clutched his teddy bear and went to sleep.

Josh wasn't entirely surprised, and was actually kind of happy that she didn't choose to have something like his height or genitals. "I agree." Was all Josh said before a flash of light consumed the room, and the room looked entirely different after the flash departed. For starters, the room walls were now painted light purple (Bri's favorite color) as supposed to the original sky blue that Josh preferred. Josh's bed remained in the room, but his pillows, blankets, and bed sheets were replaced with his sister's. His homework desk now had Bri's school supplies on top and the closets and dressers held her clothes.

"This is awesome!" Bri cheered as she hopped on to her new bed. "This bed is huge!"

"Yep! Now get outta my room!" She said, pointing to the door.

Realizing she was right, Josh walked out and started to head to what was now his and Courtney's smaller shared room. As he exited his former room though, he noticed a slight change to the door. There used to be a yellow octagon shaped sign that read "YOU ARE NOW ENTERING JOSH'S ROOM!" Now, the sign was still there, but it now read "YOU ARE NOW ENTERING BRIANNA'S ROOM!"

When Josh got to his new room, he opened the door to see that almost everything that changed in his old room was reversed. His clothes were now in Bri's dressers and closets, his bedsheets, blankets, and pillows were now on Bri's twin bed, and his homework supplies were in Bri's homework desk. The room was painted a red color now, which Josh guessed could have been a compromise color between pink (the room's old color) and sky blue (Josh's old room's color). He only got a quick glance though, as he found his sister and her friend Megan inside.

1122311.content:
While Courtney and Megan continued to talk and text on their cell phones, Josh noticed something else about his new room: it didn't have a TV. He guessed that his old one remained with Bri in her new room. "Where am I supposed to play video games?" He thought.

Just then, his mom marched into the room with a look of anger on her face. He didn't know what was going on, but he hoped he wasn't the cause of it. "Courtney!" She yelled. "You lied to me and said the dishes were done but you didn't finish! What do you have to say for yourself?"

"But mom! Megan came and..."

"No buts! I guess Megan will have to wait for you to finish."

Courtney proceeded out of the room and down the stairs to finish her chores, but Megan didn't leave the room. There was an awkward silence within the room before Josh decided to break the quiet. "So, how are you Megan?" He asked, just to be polite.

"Fine, I guess." She said in a slight Irish accent she picked up from her Ireland native parents, but her accent had become more American over the years as she met new friends like Courtney, she started to sound a bit more American. Her response didn't really convince Josh though.

"You guess?"

"I'm okay, it's just that my family is going back to Ireland for a trip, and our dog can't come along. Nobody can watch him, so he's gonna have to go to a kennel and I feel so bad for him because I can tell he hates it there."

"Oh I see." Josh said to her, he didn't really see the problem in the situation, but he wasn't a dog owner, even though he always wanted one. Josh then got hit with a great idea. "Megan, I think I know how to solve that problem."

"How?"

Josh went on to explain the story of how he gained his power and what the power could do to his sister's friend. He covered everything from the old lady to his swaps with Bri.

"Yer talkin' crazy!" She said. "Nothin' is different about ya!"

"I figured you might say that, but I figured out that my power effects reality so people think it is normal."

"Well I still don't believe ya! How would this 'power' help my dog anyway?"

"Well you see, we could swap ownership of your dog. This way we could be welcome here for the week, and Courtney and I can take care of him."

"Well if yer serious, then I would really appreciate it if you could. As long as I can have him back when I get home."

"So is that a yes then?"

"Ya, I agree." A flash blocked both the sight of him and Courtney's friend. When it disappeared, a dog with long brown fur was now present in the room. The dog immediately toppled Josh, who was still sitting on his bed, and started to lick his face.

When Josh finally managed to go the dog to stop licking, he sat up on his bed. "What's the name?"

"His name is Murphy."

"What kind of dog is he?"

"An Irish setter." Josh tried not to laugh because he thought it was funny that Courtney's friend with an Irish background had an Irish dog breed.

Murphy, just noticing the presence of Megan in the room, started to growl at her. Her eyes widened in fear. "What is wrong with him?"

Josh figured out why. "I think it's because you're not his owner anymore, he doesn't recognize you."

"But why?"

"I told you, it's the new reality. My family owns him now so he is more comfortable around us."

"Makes sense, he doesn't really like visitors too much."

"Okay just don't tell anybody about this swap, Brianna is the only other person who knows about it." He said gesturing to his little sister's new room. Megan nodded in understanding.

Megan took a piece of paper off Josh's new desk and wrote down instructions for taking care of Murphy and handed them to Josh. The top read "HOW TO CARE FOR MURPHY IN THE NEXT 2 WEEKS".

"You're going away for 2 weeks?!" Josh asked, as his new dog hopped up beside him on his new bed.

"Ya, that won't be a problem. Will it?" She asked, sitting back down on Courtney's bed.

Josh shook his head before Courtney finally walked back into the room. She immediately went over and acknowledged Murphy as if he was family. "Hey Murph!" She said while patting his head. She then sat down next to Megan on her bed. "Sorry I took so long Meg, you were probably bored spending time with this loser!" She pointed to Josh.

"Hey!" Josh said.

"Actually, Josh was very good campany." She said while smiling at him.

"Ewwww... you don't like him do you?" Courtney asked in disgust.

"Noooo!!!" Said Megan, and both girls laughed.

Josh was tired of sitting in his new room awkwardly with his sister and her friend so he decided to go outside for some fresh air. "Come Murphy!" He said, and the new Mitchell family dog followed him outside. He took him out to the back yard to let him run around for a bit. The yard was not huge by any means, but it had a pretty good size considering the were three kids and only parent in the family. He found a tennis ball resting against the house on the back porch. His new dog then chased after and brought it back, dropping it at his owner's feet. This created an endless sucker for about five minutes.
