"Hold on, I'm thinking about it." Josh slowed her down. If the swap was just for a weekend he would be non-hesitant to oblige, but the fact that it would last for an entire week made it tough. Adding on that most of his friends would become 8 year old girls, he would have no friends his age in school for a longer period of time. "How about he just try the weekend?" He proposed.

"We can, but then you'll have to do the play." Bri answered, not budging.

Finally, Josh decided to just throw in the towel. "Fine, I'll give you my friends for the spot in the play." Two immediate flashes followed. Josh found that he still had Bri's clothes on, but he looked in his closet and noticed that the fairy costume was missing from the set.

"Okay," Josh said to his sister satisfied. "All good?"

"Pleasure doing business with you." She replied, copy something she had heard her mom say on the phone once or twice before walking out the door.

"_______, ________ is hear to see you." Courtney called from downstairs.
11232132.title: Friends

112322.content:
Josh could feel his face reddening with embarrassment and soon found himself pushing a giggling Bri out of his room. "I told you I'm done tonight." He closed the door behind his sister and promptly locked the door. After a few minutes, Josh heard a knock on his door and he angrily made his way to the door. "I told you I'm done swapping tonight." As he opened the door, he found Courtney standing there with a bewildered look on her face.

"What are you talking about?" Courtney wondered as she looked around the room to see if anything peculiar was going on.

"Oh, it's nothing really." Josh replied back a little too quickly that caused Courtney to strengthen her questioning.

She looked at her brother but found nothing odd about his appearance or the fact that he wore clothing meant for an 8 year old girl. Instead she felt it was completely normal and started to develop a wry smile. "Did you swap something with Bri?" She really didn't think anything was different, but tried to play her hand and bluff. She smiled a huge smile as she watched Josh's eyes grow as wide a saucers.

"Listen it was her idea, I didn't want to swap clothing with her after I got her hair." Josh answered back to her as he started to stroke his newly braided hair.

"How did this happen?" Courtney wondered as she smiled. She was certainly glad to know that her manipulation skills worked.

Josh completely broke down and told Courtney what happened. "And that's what happened. Please don't tell Mom."

"I won't tell her if you do a swap with me." Courtney replied back.

"Fine, I will do ALMOST anything." Josh pleaded to his sister, making sure to put an emphasis on almost.

"I won't tell Mom, if you swap _______ with me." Courtney declared as she put her hands on her hips.
112322.title: His sister, Courtney

choices: Josh gives in and does anothe swap.
He's grown immune and ignores her.
1123221.content:
"I won't tell Mom, if you swap rooms with me." Courtney declared as she put her hands on her hips defiantly. "I'm getting tired of having to share a room with Bri and I want to have my own room for a bit." She didn't know what to expect, if anything would happen at all. "Well?"

"I'm thinking, just give me a moment." Josh replied back to her. He didn't really know if he wanted to get rid of his only defense from his sister. Looking back at his sister who looked ready to involve their Mom in the matter, Josh decided to make a deal. "I will only do it if we can swap back after a couple days." He replied trying to strike a deal with his sister.

Courtney stood there for a moment thinking about it. "Fine." She declared, but was soon enveloped in the blinding light. When she was able to open her eyes once again, she felt her mouth open in awe. There in front of her was her unmade bed with the piles of clothes scattered throughout the room. "Oh my god, I didn't think it would work." She brought her hand up to her mouth, almost as if she needed to contain her excitement.

Josh sighed as he looked around. He knew that he was in trouble for the next week, with him now having to share a room with Brianna. "I'm done." He replied as he held up his hands in defeat. "I'm not going to swap anything else." He declared as he left the room to see how his new room looked.

Josh walked over to the room that he now shared with Bri, at least for the time being, and immediately felt something clinging to his mid section. He looked down to see Bri's, well now his, pink shirt to see Brianna hanging there with a huge smile on her face. "I was standing right next to the door when I heard you talking with Courtney."

"Wait, what?" Josh stammered as he heard this. "What were you doing outside my room?" Bri quickly let go of his midsection and looked a little embarrassed.

"I was just wanting to see if you would want to swap some more." She replied as she tried her best to give him her puppy dog look.
1123221.title: rooms

choices: Courtney comes in and tells Josh that Jenn is here
11232211.content:
"Okay. But only one more swap for now." Josh said while adjusting his junk so it would feel comfortable inside his panties.

"Yay!" His sister cheered. "Let's swap our muscles!"

Josh almost burned out laughing for two reasons. One, she pronounced it like 'mus-coles'. Two, there was no way he would want to swap that with her. "You mean muscles?" He asked pronouncing it the right way and smiling.

"Yeah those." She said.

"Sorry, but no thanks."

"But why not? They would help me win my game tomorrow, I can give them back after then if you want."

Josh thought she did have a point. It wasn't the worst thing to swap either, at least she didn't want his dick and testicles. He could just ask her for them back tomorrow anyway. "Fine. I agree to swap muscles with you."

The flash returned and went away again in an instant. When Bri looked at her body and saw the differences their swap had made. Her arms and legs didn't gain any length, but they gained plenty of width and thickness. She saw her right arm and flexed her new bicep.

Josh didn't have huge muscles by any means, but his friend Tyler, who played three different sports this past year, worked out often and started bringing Josh to his gym a couple of times a week. He was just learning the ropes and everything, but there was definitely a difference from the year before. Josh had to get stronger if he wanted to start dating girls. He started to think that maybe Jenn would like it if he were stronger.

"Wow! Even my legs have muscles!" She said amazed.

Josh on the other hand, saw a opposite difference from Bri's. The length of his arms and legs remained the same, but they had definitely lost their fair share of size in width and thickness. His body looked extremely out of proportion considering he now had the arm size of an 8 year old girl.

The youngest Mitchell wandered over to a big brown box with likely something heavy inside, but she proceeded to lift it with ease! "Awesome!" She said. "I couldn't lift that 10 minutes ago!"

"What's inside?" Josh asked.

"That's the new TV mom got for us. It looks just like Courtney's." She said pointing to a picture on the box. "Isn't it cool?"

That made sense to Josh, he had one in his old room before he made the swap with his other sister. He noticed his TV remained in Courtney's new room while he now didn't have one, despite still having his video games on a shelf now in his new room. His sisters had been begging for a new TV for months, and Kim said that they could get one as a shared birthday present, even though their birthdays were actually 5 months apart. Josh guessed she got them one early, which was good now that he had a new TV to play his games on. On another note, Bri was acting like it was normal that Courtney had her own room and not him, even though she knew of Josh's power.

"Let me try to pick it up." He said, not answering Bri's question from before. He knew that before his latest swap he would pick it it with no problem. Now, he wasn't so sure. Sure enough, when Josh tried to pick the new TV up, he couldn't get it an inch off of the ground.

"Ha!" His sister said laughing. "I'm stronger than you now."

Ignoring her comment, Josh suddenly thought of something when he noticed how much lighter he felt. "Hey Bri, do we have a scale in the bathroom?"

"Of course we do, shouldn't you know that? This has been your room for the longest time!"

Josh headed over to the bathroom that he now shared with his youngest sister and stepped on the scale. Sure enough, he had dropped in weight. He went from weighting 135 pounds to 90! It was likely because of what Josh learned from biology class where muscle played a big role in one's weight.

Bri followed her brother into the bathroom noticed that he had dropped weight. "How did you do that?" She asked.

"Here I'll show you. Step on the scale!" He said hopping off.

His sister hopped on and her weight read 109 pounds. "Whoa! How did that happen?" Bri questioned with curiosity. Josh went on to explain to his sister that the muscle swap between the two had caused them to gain or drop in weight. She suddenly looked concerned. "Does that mean I'm fat now?"

"No, it just means you weigh more because your stronger."

"Oh, okay!" She said, the smile returning to her face.

"Do you want to set up the TV?" He asked his youngest sister, twirling his ponytail.

"Sure!" She agreed, following her brother out where they started to unbox the new product.
11232211.title: Josh gives in

112322112.content:
Josh never got that visit the night before from Jenn, but she made sure to call him first and promised to make it up to him. As for Josh, he made no more swaps after the three he had made with Bri. He knew she wanted to keep going but decided to end it there since he already had the longest hair in the family, the wardrobe of an 8 year old girl, and basically sticks for arms and legs.

By the time Josh woke up on Saturday, everyone had departed from the house. He assumed Bri had left for the game with his mother, and his phone had a text from Courtney reading that she went shopping with her friends for the day and was going back to her friend Christina's house for a slumber party after.

Josh basically spent most of his time playing video games in the living room, while occasionally taking a break for homework in his new room until the afternoon when Bri and Kim returned. Josh was doing homework when he heard a knock on his door.

"Come in." He said.

"Hi Josh!" Bri greeted.

"Hey sis, how did your game go?"

"Great! We won and I played REALLY well. There was no hair in my way and I was stronger than all of the other girls."

"Glad I could help. So, are you ready to swap back now?"

"It depends on what we're swapping." Bri said.

"What do you mean?"

"Well, we agreed you could have your hair back by now."

"Right." He acknowledged, which actually triggered a flash. Josh touched his head and found he had his original hair before looking over and seeing the same for his sister.

"And I don't need your muscles anymore since I used them for the game."

"Uh huh." Another flash swapped their muscles back, giving the two their original builds again.

"But I like wearing your clothes, they're more comfortable."

"Well, I guess we could wait until tomorrow night for that." He told her.

"Really? Thanks!"

"Is that all?"

"I gave you two things back already, can we at least make one more swap?"

Josh saw some fairness in the idea since he already got two swap backs he wanted. "I guess that's fine, what did you have in mind?"

"______." She announced
112322112.title: Tomorrow after Bri's game...

1123221121.content:
"Friends." She announced.

"Why that?" Josh questioned.

"I honestly think your friends are pretty cool and I want to see what it's like to have older friends for once."

That swap actually seemed to be a bit lower on Josh's scale than some of the other swaps. It wasn't like he was swapping anything on his body physically and he had no plans with friends for at least the next day. What worried him though was the outcome of the swap. "What about me? Don't you think I'll get bored of having 8 year old girls as my friends? No offense."

"None taken. But, you can at least give it a try. Just because their young doesn't mean they're no fun!"

"But still, they're all the opposite gender, not to mention half my age." He pointed out.

"How about we try it just for one day? If you still don't like it, we'll swap back." Bri said hopefully.

"Okay fine." Josh agreed and a flash followed.

"Awesome, thanks!" Bri said as she left the room.

Looking down at the most boyish outfit he could find in Bri's wardrobe, which was a purple tee shirt with some gray sweatpants, a thought crossed his mind. "Let's hope Bri gets over this whole swapping thing fast."

"Why not? You said you would make one more swap with me."

"I did, I did. But I consider that to be a bit extreme. Ever wonder why we aren't supposed to see each other naked?" He tried to make a point.

"I still think it would be fun, I want to see what it's like to be able to pee standing up." Bri countered

"I'm still not sure..."

"Plus, you can see what it's like for girls when the pee." She added.

Josh suddenly thought up a proposition that could be beneficial for him no matter what. "I'll tell you what, I'll swap my private parts with you for ONE day if I can have my clothes back. If you don't like that offer, I'll let you keep the clothes and you can pick something else."

"I'll give you 2 minutes."
1123221122.title: Private parts

11232212.content:
"I was just wanting to see if you would want to swap some more." She replied as she tried her best to give him her puppy dog look.

"Sorry, Bri." Josh replied as he lay down on his bed, which looked the same when it was in his room, and reached for the latest gaming magazine that just arrived yesterday. "I've grown used to your 'puppy dog look' and it really doesn't work on me anymore." Laying down on his stomach, Josh read his magazine and didn't pay attention to Bri.

"What do you mean it doesn't work on you anymore?" Bri protested as she crossed her arms across her chest, which she still wore his blue 'School House Rock' T-shirt. "Don't you find it fun that you can swap stuff around?"

Josh casually put down his magazine and looked at his sister. As he turned his head he felt his braided hair shift and he didn't really know if he would get used to it. "I do find it fun, but I feel that I am being run over and I really don't feel that I should be." He lay there for a moment when he had an idea. "Actually Bri," He looked over at his sister and saw her crest-fallen face starting to smile once more. "If you give me my clothes back, I think I can swap a couple more things with you."

Bri thought about it for a moment. "But I like your clothes, they're not as tight as girl clothes are." She looked down at the loose flowing clothes that graced her body. "I could swap back our hair." This seemed to pique Josh's interest a little bit.
11232212.title: He's grown immune and ignores her.

112322121.content:
Bri thought about it for a moment. "But I like your clothes, they're not as tight as girl clothes are." She looked down at the loose flowing clothes that graced her body. "I could swap back our hair." This seemed to pique Josh's interest a little bit

Josh thought about it for several minutes before making up his mind. He could live with both, but which one would be the best to get rid of. As he sat there he looked down at his arms and noticed how it looked much lighter and not as dense. Over the years, Josh watched in awe as the hair on his arms and legs started to grow in and certainly made him feel more manly. Looking down at his legs, he noticed that they looked much the same that his arms did. 'Do I want to have to wear girl clothes or do I want to at least look manly with some hair on my body.' He thought to himself.

"Well?" Bri asked impatiently as she watched him mull over what to pick. "What are you going to pick."

"Don't get your panties in a twist." Josh replied back to her, but winced when he realized that it was a poor choice of words, since he was now wearing them instead of her. "Fine..." He took a deep breath. "I want to swap back our hair." Bri squealed with delight as she waited for the light to come over them once more, but as she waited for over a minute she seemed a little disappointed to see that nothing happened. Josh sighed. "You're supposed to accept it."

"Oh, I accept." She replied back and immediately they were both bathed with the bright light. When they opened their eyes once more, Bri noticed that Josh had his shorter hair style back on his head. She brought her hands back and felt the braided hair that she did earlier and marveled at how it was still braided, but this time on her own head. She looked back over at her brother. "I would have thought that you would have chosen the clothing."

Josh smiled as he looked down at his girlish clothing. "I was about to, but then I remembered that you have some pants and it's not like I will have to wear any dresses if I don't want to."

"Wow, you really thought about this." Bri replied back to him, seemingly impressed. "Are you ready for the next swap?" She smiled as she watched her brother begrudgingly nod his head in agreement. "Good, I think we should swap _______."
112322121.title: Josh swaps back the hair

choices: Jenn comes over to watch the movie Josh suggested and later study
When Bri returns home from her soccer game the next night...
1123221211.content:
"Good, I think we should swap how tall we are." Bri said hopefully.

"You mean height?" Josh asked his sister, which was followed by a nod. "Sorry sis, but I don't think I want to do that."

"Please Joshie? It's only fair, I gave you back your hair." She pleaded, making those puppy dog eyes once again.

"Why do you need my height anyway?"

"Two reasons. One, I want to see what it's like being tall, two, it could give me an advantage over the other players in tomorrow's game."

While Josh saw a point in reason number two, he still didn't want to swap though. "Nah, I think I'm good."

"Well we could always swap something else, like our private parts..." She said.

"You would really expect me to do that?" He questioned laughing.

"No, but swapping our height is not as bad for you. You can choose from one of them."

"And what if I say no to both?"

"Then you won't get your clothes back." Bri threatened.

Josh took this threat seriously, as he didn't want to end up with his youngest sister's clothes longer than he had to. Even though he chose to get his hair back rather than clothes, he was still not completely comfortable wearing them. He figured there was worse things than being smaller, and he was definitely not willing to swap away his manhood. "Fine, I agree to swap our heights." Josh said, ending the negotiations.

The flash of light returned, and when Josh's visibility returned, everything seemed WAY larger! He probably hadn't been this small since he was six years old. Bri was small for a girl her age after all, as he heard his mom say the other night that she was four feet, two inches. His old height was five feet, five inches, which meant that he had shrunk fifteen inches! He definitely felt a foot smaller, at least. He also felt lighter, as it wouldn't have been normal (or healthy) for him to remain the same weight but stand over a foot smaller. His arms, legs, hands, and feet were also generally smaller. Bri's clothes were once again resized, they were almost exactly the same size as when she had them.

Bri on the other hand, felt heavier, had bigger hands, feet, arms, and legs, and everything looked REALLY tiny to her! The ground now seemed so far away. She wasn't sure how much she grew, but she had to guess she was over a foot taller. Now She looked down and saw her now tiny brother, and couldn't help but think how cute he looked. "Hey LITTLE bro! Didn't see you down there!" She teased.

Now having to look up at his sister, Josh actually felt quite intimidated. "I'm still older you know." He retorted.

"Yeah, but your way smaller!" Bri ran into the bathroom that she and Courtney shared. There were two sinks, Bri's had a step stool in front of hers so she could reach at her old height. "Guess I won't be needing this anymore!" She said tossing the stool aside before opening a closet and putting it in there. "Whoa, I look SUPER different taller!"

Josh followed her sister into the bathroom, but he couldn't see over the sinks to the mirror. "I can't see!" He complained.

"Here, I'll help you!" Bri said laughing as she helped her now smaller brother on to the top of the table. Josh felt that it was really demeaning. He sat on top of the counter, and looked into the mirror with his sister. She was right when she said they looked really really different, but not in the way he thought she meant. They looked ridiculous! Not just because Josh was a boy wearing the clothes of his little sister, and vice versa, but Bri still looked like an eight year old, but the size of a teenager. Meanwhile Josh looked like a teenager the size of a six year old. He thought he kind of looked like a midget, not that he had anything against midgets. He still wasn't liking the swap though.

"Uhh... when can we swap back?" Josh cautiously asked his younger but now bigger sister.

"How about this, I already gave you your hair back, even though you said we could do it tomorrow night. You can choose whether you want your clothes back or your height back. I get the keep the other one for a bit longer after that."

That actually sounded like a fair deal to Josh. Eight year olds were sometimes over their heads and unreasonable, but Bri sometimes had her moments of intelligence. "Sounds like a fair deal to me." He said, hopping down from the table and reaching up to shake his younger sister's hand, while Bri reached down. "I'm going to go play some video games." He left his sister's bathroom and eventually her room, only much shorter than when he entered.
1123221211.title: Heights

choices: Josh tries to have fun trying on Jenn's old clothes
Josh tried to get out of it by telling Jenn about the swapping power
11232212111.content:
Josh had just sat down to play video games when Kim knocked on the door, "Josh, Jenn is here for your study session and movie night." Josh called out, "Thanks mom, you can send her in," and he quickly turned off his game system and checked the mirror to make sure he was presentable. Although now that he was a 4'2" teenage boy with the wardrobe of his 8 year old sister he wasn't exactly sure how he could possibly make himself look cool for Jenn. Pretty soon Kim opened the door and let Jenn into his and Bri's now shared room. "Remember the rules, keep the door open unless Bri is also in the room with you."

"We know Ms. Mitchell, but you'd know that we don't do that kind of stuff, we're just friends." Jenn said as Josh felt the tiniest twitch in his left eye for some reason that he didn't even notice.

Kim left the two of them (and Bri) in the bedroom. "So, what movie did you have in mind this evening? Rom com? Fantasy?"

"I was thinking Sci Fi." Josh said pulling out a time travel movie. Josh was expecting to have the usual fun time of popcorn and a movie that he'd been having with Jenn for years, but apparently the swaps that had been made put a few minor twists into it. For one, every few minutes or so, since Bri basically had to watch too since she shared a room with Josh now, Bri started asking questions and Josh and Jenn had to keep pausing the movie to explain the more complicated plot points to her. And then as they were watching, Josh started to feel uncomfortable with Jenn practically towering over him now. He started to uncomfortably adjust his positioning to try to minimize this effect, but seeing this Jenn kindly offered, "Would you like to sit in my lap?" Josh blushed a deep shade of red and quickly muttered, "I'm good, I'm good," as Bri at the same time started laughing and laughing. Bri started laughing so much she actually choked on some juice she was drinking and ran with her long legs to their shared bathroom to recover.

Seeing this Jenn said in a low voice so Bri wouldn't here, "Your sister is nice and all, but have you talked to your mom about getting your own room?"

Josh thought back to a few hours ago when he swapped rooms with Courtney, "I'm in negotiations for a new room right now. I might have one of my own any day now."

"All right Josh, that's great! Oh, and speaking of good news, just before I came over here I thought of something that I think you'll love."

"Really? What have you got in mind?"

"Well, I was going through some of my old clothes to clear out my closet when I had a thought. A lot of my old elementery school clothes would look so cute on you! You're the perfect size and if you wear my old stuff it'll have a totally cool retro feel at school. Oh I know, while your mom is at Bri's soccer game tomorrow, you should totally come to my house and you can try it all on. It'll be like our own private fashion show! And then after we're done we can study since it doesn't look like we're getting to it today. Doesn't that sound like a plan?"

"That sounds...great." Josh said not wanting to let down Jenn who seemed very proud and excited about this idea of hers. Josh was not as excited, he was dealing with the swaps with Bri because it was different and kind of interesting but something about wearing some other little girl's clothes, even if they were Jenn's seemed a little odd. After Jenn and Josh tentatively agreed to these plans, Bri finally finished recovering from her laughing fit and the three of them finished the movie with a lot of stuff being explained to Bri along the way. Afterwards Jenn went back to her place just as the sun set. It was getting late when Josh went back to his new room and Bri was already her bed getting her rest before her big game tomorrow. Josh knew that there would be no use in waking her up to try and switch everything back so he wouldn't have to be a fashion model for Jenn tomorrow. So he decided to suck it up and went to bed himself as he decided what he was going to do tomorrow thanks to his switching power.

The next day he woke up and was disappointed to see that everyone had already left to go to Bri's game. "Well, I know what I'm doing today." Josh said as he jumped down further from his bed than he was used to, and went to his closet where he dug around and finally settled on a cute pair of overalls, with a yellow flowery shirt, and Bri's princess themed tennis shoes and made his way over to Jenn's house where she was waiting with a box full of clothing that was literally taller than Josh's current height. 'How am I going to get out of this." Josh thought as Jenn happily pulled out a little girl's dress.
11232212111.title: Jenn comes over to Hang out with Josh

choices: Bri doesn't want to swap back just yet.
1123221212.content:
"Wow, you really thought about this." Bri replied back to him, seemingly impressed. "Are you ready for the next swap?" She smiled as she watched her brother begrudgingly nod his head in agreement. "Good, I think we should swap our places in the family." Josh couldn't help but look at his sister and wondered what she meant by that. "Well, if I think it does it the way I think it will. You." Bri pointed over to her brother. "Will be the youngest girl and I." She pointed her finger back over to herself. "Will be the oldest kid."

"You've put a lot of thought into this haven't you?" Josh chuckled as he thought about it for a moment. 'I guess, I could do it for a couple days. I know it will certainly give me a break from the chores.' Being the oldest in the family had it's perks, but he also had the most chores to do too.

"Well, do you want to do it or not?" Bri asked impatiently.

"Fine, I accept." The blinding light soon enveloped the room once more and they looked over at each other, not seeing anything different.

"Did it work?" Bri asked as she looked down at herself.

"I think it did." Josh answered, looking around the unchanged room. "How about we go down stairs and ask Mom." Bri nodded and they both made their way down stairs to find their Mom talking on her cell phone talking to somebody lovingly. But seeing two of her children walk into the room, she abruptly told them that she had to go.

"Hey you two." Kim chuckled as she put her phone away into her purse. "What are you two up to?"

Josh thinking about the best way to phrase the question, he looked to his Mom. "Mom do you love me?"

Taken aback by the question, Kim looked over at Josh and started to stroke his hair in a loving manner. "Sure sweetie, you will always be my little girl." Josh looked over at Bri who had the biggest grin on her face.

"Who was on the phone?" Bri asked bring her usual nosey self.

"Oh." Kim replied with a bit of blush. "That was Mike."

Josh just shook his head trying to help with the sudden drop of information. "You mean Dr. Wright, your boss?"

"Well yeah, sweetie." Kim made her way over to the kitchen table and had a seat. "Well, we've been talking and decided to start taking it to the next level."

"You mean dating?" Josh asked, still not used to the change that was coming to his family. 'Sure, Dad left them years ago and hasn't been seen since, but this was his family.' He thought to himself.

"Mmhmm." Kim nodded her head. "And he wants to meet you guys tomorrow and get to know you all a little bit better."

A million different thoughts were starting to go through Josh's head, but was soon stopped by Bri speaking up for the first time since coming down. "Wow, really?" Josh looked over at his sister who seemed to be beaming as much as their Mom. To her it only came natural, since she never really got to know their real dad. "So what are we going to do?"

"Well he will be taking you to a baseball game." Kim replied as she turned to Bri, but was cut short by Josh.

"I want to go to the baseball game." Josh announced looking over at the two of them.

"Oh, I know, but you see..." Kim commented, trying to find the best words that would fit. "Well it's going to be a boy's thing." Josh didn't really understand what was going on.

Bri's smile turned even more devilish as she looked over at Josh. "What is he going to do with the girls?"

"Oh, I think he's going to do something special. I don't really know yet, since he just wanted to run by the game idea by me first." Kim commented. "Now how about you two run back up to your room and clean it up before it gets too late."
1123221212.title: place in the family

choices: They keep their own bodies, but have different lives.
1123221213.content:
"Wow, you really thought about this." Bri replied back to him, seemingly impressed. "Are you ready for the next swap?" She smiled as she watched her brother begrudgingly nod his head in agreement. "Good, I think we should swap personalities."

"I'm sorry, but I don't think I can do that." Josh replied as he backed away from her and brought his hands up to shield himself from her persistent stares.

"Why not?" Bri asked chuckling. "I don't think it will be too much different. I mean, I consider myself a tomboy." She really did consider herself to be a tomboy, but she wasn't too much of one for Josh's taste to actually swap something like that with her.

"Maybe later on." Josh said reassuringly to his sister, who seemed not to be too heart broken about it. "I promise."

Bri sighed. "Okay, but what do you want to swap?" She thought for a moment and had a brain storm. "Ooo... How about we swap lives for a day or two. I don't mind being the big brother for the weekend."

"I don't know about that." Josh said kind of apprehensively. "I really don't want to be stuck as you."

"You won't be stuck, I mean, it's only for the weekend." Bri replied as she tried to change her brother's mind by redoing the puppy dog look. "And you will get to go see inside the woman's locker room."

"Geeze, Bri." Josh groaned as he watched his sister. Being an average teenage boy, Josh wasn't always thinking with his head, but with another body part instead. "And you're sure that it's only for the weekend?" Seeing that she may have a way to get what she wanted, Bri eagerly nodded her head. "Fine. I'll swap lives with you." He announced to the power that lay deep inside him.

"I'll do it too." Bri responded eagerly as they were soon enveloped with the bright light. When she opened them, she noticed that _______________.
1123221213.title: Something else.

choices: Jenn arrives to spend time with Bri
Kim tells Josh that Jenna has invited him over to visit
11232212131.content:
"I'll do it too." Bri responded eagerly as they were soon enveloped with the bright light. When she opened them, she noticed that they swapped bodies as well! "Now way, I'm you!" Bri said to Josh in his old voice while looking down at her new body.

"What the hell?!?" Josh screamed, obviously in shock with the results. His new voice caused him to cover his mouth with his now smaller right hand in surprise.

"Watch your mouth, a little girl like you shouldn't say those words!" Bri said to her brother, not being able contain her laughter.

"Can we please fix this?" Josh pleaded, while trying to control his long hair, which had come back to him in the swap.

"No, I like the way this happened. We'll swap back at the end of the weekend."

"This can't get any worse..." Josh thought.

As if on cue his sister came and topped it. "Aw man, I'm wearing my old clothes. Can we swap them again Josh?"

Josh looked down to see that his new body was wearing his old clothes. "At least something is finally going my way." He thought. "Sorry Bri but these are my clothes and I'd like to wear them, even if this is not my body."

"I'm Josh now and those are MY clothes." Bri persisted.

"Sorry sis, but no."

"Please? If I'm going to live your life I should at least get to wear your clothes."

Josh knew he would eventually lose this battle, and Bri did have a point of some sort. Plus, he already have them to her earlier so he thought he should let her keep them for awhile. "Fine, but this is the last one until we swap lives back."

"Okay!" Bri said.

"Then I agree." The next thing Josh knew after the light, he was wearing his sister's clothes once again, but they were a bit more comfortable this time around considering he now had a body that was designed for the clothes.

"Thanks bro!" Bri cheered.

Josh decided to leave, wanting to get out of the situation he was in. Not knowing what to do, he decided to go downstairs. He entered the kitchen which was only occupied his mom at the moment. "Hey Bri, how's my smallest little girl doing?"

"Fine I guess." Josh lied. "I'm gonna grab a soda." He said opening the fridge. Kim gave him an odd look because the old Bri didn't drink any soda, but she didn't know any better.

Josh took out a cylinder can and popped it open, which was harder than usual because Bri's fingers weren't used to opening soda cans. He climbed up to a high chair and sat at the island in the middle of the kitchen. He took a sip and a immediately spit it out all over the place. "Ugh... Why does this taste so bad?" He asked, not aware that he now had Bri's tastebuds.

Ignoring her 'daughter's' question, Kim proceeded to scold her child. "Brianna! You just made a huge mess! Clean it up NOW." She said sternly. She went and handed Josh some paper towels to wipe up the table.

Still not used to his new name, Josh went to clean his mess, but he couldn't reach the top. "Mom, I can't reach it."

"Here, stand on a chair." His mom suggested, patting a high chair to get on.

"This is gonna be a LONG weekend." Josh thought.
11232212131.title: New Lives, New Bodies

11232212132.content:
"I'll do it too." Bri responded eagerly as they were soon enveloped with the bright light. When she opened them, she noticed that they kept their own bodies, but have swapped places. Looking down, Bri found that she was once again wearing her own clothes. Bringing her hands up to her head, she felt that she indeed had Josh's hair once more. "At least I got one thing, that I wanted." She replied chuckling as she saw her brother with her longer hair.

Josh felt his hair beating against his back again and sighed. "I thought I got rid of this." He groaned as he looked down and noticed that he had his original clothes back on. Silently, he was appreciative of having his original clothes back on too.

"That's not fair." Bri yelled out as she pointed over at his clothes. "I wanted to wear that." Josh fearing that his Mom would come in tried to calm her down.

"Shh..." He tried in vain to calm her down. "We don't want Mom to come up here." He was afraid his Mom to come up to the room and notice them swapping thing back and forth. After finding out that there wasn't anybody coming up the stairs or down the hall, he let out a great sigh of relief. "Now, what can I do to quiet you down."

Bri looked over at him wondering what he was so worried about. "I want us to swap our clothes and hair back." She pointed over to him and gestured to him.

"Fine." Josh replied in a defeated tone and soon found the light enveloping them once again for the second time in 2 minutes. After he opened his eyes, he looked down and found that he once again had Bri's pink shirt and jean shorts. "I knew it was too good to be true."

"I don't know what you're complaining about." Bri replied back to him. "I got my hair back." Just then there was a knock on the door. Both Josh and Bri look towards the door and found their Mom waiting in the door way.

She looked towards Bri. "Josh, I don't know what that screaming was about, but it needs to stop." She looked over to Josh. "And Bri, what have I told you about egging him on. Please keep it down, I'm about to call a client about a job I'm doing for them." Both Bri and Josh nodded their heads as they watched their Mom leave the room.

"I can't believe she thinks your me." Bri stammered as she looked back over to her brother.
11232212132.title: They keep their own bodies, but have different ...

choices: Josh finds Bri before he leaves, and begs her to help fix the situation
Bri already left to hang with Josh's friends, Josh has to play in Bri's game
112322121321.content:
"Bri... Bri, wake up!" Josh felt somebody nudging him. He opened his eyes to see it was his sister Courtney.

Josh looked down to see his pink camouflage pajamas and immediately thought back to what happened after school the day before, from the lady giving him his powers to swapping lives with his youngest sister. Not much happened after that except for an awkward dinner, where Josh just kept to himself for most of the time. Kim then made 'Bri' go to bed at 9:30 even though it was Friday. Josh wasn't quite happy about it, but seeing as his mom thought he was an 8 year old girl he didn't have much of a choice.

"Courtney? What do you want?" Josh asked, squinting in order to help his eyes adjust to the light filling his new bedroom.

"Mom told me to come wake you up and tell you to put your soccer uniform on. You're leaving for your game soon."

Josh's eyes went from halfway open to twice as big than normal when he was wide awake. "Crap, I forgot Bri... I mean I had a game today!" He thought. "Umm... tell mom I'll be down soon." He told Courtney to buy himself some time.

"I can't play in a soccer game, I don't even know how!" Josh thought. "I've got to find Bri." His first instinct was to go to his old room since Bri was technically now the oldest sibling, but he realized that he handed his room over to Courtney. That meant Bri should have still been in what was now their shared room. "Where could she be?" He thought, starting to panic.
112322121321.title: The next day...

choices: Bri takes Josh up on his offer
Bri decides to give Josh her soccer skills instead
1123221213211.content:
Josh guessed that the only place Bri would be on the upstairs floor level was in the room they now shared. Since that turned out to not be the case, Josh proceeded to go downstairs to find her. When he reached the bottom of the stairs he heard 2 things, one of which was someone doing the dishes. He figured that was his mom, and the only other sound was the TV. He walked into the sitting room where it was and found Bri sitting there. Her long brown hair cascaded down to a smaller version of one of his tee shirts, and she was wearing a pair of plaid flannel pajama pants to accompany it. "Hey Bri, what you up to?" She asked, playing the part of her brother.

"No time for games, we've got a problem." He announced.

"What kind of problem?"

"I forgot that you had a soccer game today and I have no idea how to play and I don't think it's a good idea for me to try taking your place." Josh explained.

"So what do we do?"

"I say we swap our places on your team so you'll be on it once again as me and I can stay home as you."

"That could work, but why don't I just give you me soccer skills so you'll be able to fit in?" She offered.

The logic behind his sister plan worked out, the only problem for Josh was he really didn't want to go and play with other girls half his age in Bri's game. Because of this, he was starting to get desperate. "I'll tell you what, you do my swap and go play for me, and I'll swap lives with you next weekend as well."

"Really?" She asked surprised.
1123221213211.title: Josh finds Bri before he leaves

choices: After Bri and his mom leave, Josh is alone with Courtney
11232212132111.content:
"Really?" She asked surprised. "I'll definitely do that instead!" That was enough to trigger the flash of light, which swapped their places on the team.

Almost as if on cue, their mother walked in and looked straight at Bri. "Josh, what are you doing? You have to get ready for your game, we're leaving soon!"

"Sorry mom, I'll be right on that." She said as she ran upstairs to get changed into her uniform.

"Bri! I have breakfast for you in the kitchen!" He heard his mom call from back in the kitchen as he snapped back to reality. He walked and found a bowl of cereal placed on the counter. He was about to question why he was eating that instead of his normal pancakes or waffles, but then remembered that Bri's diet was a bit different and she never ate food like that. So he just decided to go along with it and took the bowl to his seat at the table. When he got about halfway through, his mom came over with a slight smile on her face. "Are you feeling okay?" She asked.

"Yeah, why wouldn't I be?"

"It's just that your sitting in the seat that Josh normally does, that's all. Don't worry, it's not a big deal or anything." She assured him.

Josh realized that he sat down without even thinking and almost blew his cover because of it. He knew he had to be more careful if he didn't want more people finding out about his power.
11232212132111.title: Bri takes Josh up on his offer

112322121321112.content:
Contradicting to his first 24 hours with the power, the next day and a half was not nearly as adventurous for Josh. On Saturday, Josh had to avoid going through his normal routine since Courtney was keeping a watchful eye over him since she thought that he was really her 8 year old sister. That meant no video games, so Josh just spent most of the day doing Bri's homework for her. When he finished with that, he did his own. He had to look out for Courtney though because technically he was a third grade girl doing high school level homework.

The only swap he made otherwise was that evening when Bri came back, where they swapped places on Bri's soccer team once again to avoid further confusion. Bri's team was off the next day so her weekend schedule from then on out was soccer free.

Sunday was most of the same, Josh spent most of the day with Bri so neither had to pretend like they were someone they were not. He had to admit the weekend did not turn out to be as bad as he anticipated. The easy life of an 8 year old was something Josh had forgot about and it was nice to literally get a break from his his life for once. Finally, Sunday evening had rolled around and it was finally time to swap back.

When it came for bed time, Josh and Bri were laying in their beds prepared to go to sleep. "This weekend was fun." Bri said. "We should do this more often."

"Maybe in the future. Besides, there's next weekend too." He told her.

"Oh yeah, you're right." She realized with a growing smile.

"Anyway, are you ready to swap back now?"
112322121321112.title: On Sunday evening...

choices: The following day, the swapped siblings experience a day of school as each other
1123221213211122.content:
"Actually, I've been thinking..." She started. "Living your life has been a ton of fun, and mine was better than your thought it would be."

"What are you saying?"

"I'm saying lets stay like this for a couple more days. And can go to high school for you and you can go to elementary school for me." She proposed.

"Well, you were right that your life wasn't as bad as I expected, but I still want to get back into my own life." Josh responded.

"Why not? I think it could be fun we could learn a lot about each other."

"True, but you also aren't ready for high school and would fail all of my classes for me." He pointed out.

"Well, isn't there something we can swap to fix that? Like school knowledge or something?" She asked.

"Schooling?"

"Yeah, that."

"I guess we could." He said realization out loud.

"How about this, let me go to school as you for two days and we won't swap again next weekend." This was actually intriguing to Josh, as he figured he would like a weekend to himself in the coming days.

Josh gave in. "Alright fine, but we're swapping back Tuesday night."

"Yay!" Bri said happily.

"If we're going to do this, let's swap schooling then." He told her.

"Okay, sure." The light enveloped the shared room. Josh closed his eyes, while Bri actually his under her covers to avoid the flash.

"Goodnight sis." Josh mumbled to his sister as he turned out the lamp's light.

"Sweet dreams Bri." She replied.
1123221213211122.title: Bri has a different idea

choices: Bri wants to swap back and go.
Bri's getting bored of that place and lets Josh go.
112322121322.content:
Josh and Bri heard their Mom continue talking to her boss about some of the office finances. As they grew bored with that, they made their way down stairs and sat on the sofa and watched their favorite cartoon channel. Even though Josh was 15 years old, he still enjoyed watching cartoons with his sisters. As they continued to watch, both of them were nearly startled by the house phone going off. Bri, being the closest, reached over and answered it. "Hello, Mitchell residence." She replied as she'd been told many times before. "Oh hey Katie. Huh?" She looked perplexed at what Katie was saying.

"I said, can I talk to Bri." Katie asked over the telephone. "I want to ask her something.

"But this is Bri." Bri told her friend until she remembered that she swapped her life with her brother. "Umm... Just kidding, here she is." She handed the phone over to her brother. "Here it's Katie."

Josh looked at his sister, still wearing his blue t shirt and jeans. He certainly remembered Katie. A shy young girl who is the same age as Bri. Her Mom, a Japanese woman, married her Dad, a U.S. Army sergeant, in Japan. After his enlistment was done and over with, they moved back to the United States and that's where Katie was born. Josh always thought she was cute, but knew she was way too young for him. He took the phone. "Hey Katie." He answered over the phone.

"Hey, what's going on with your brother today?" She asked chuckling a little. "She said that she was Bri."

Josh didn't know what to say about this. He thought about it for a moment before answering. "I don't know, just being a dweeb, I guess."

Katie giggled hearing this. "I know, right, but he is cute." Josh blushed slightly and continued to listen. "My Mom and Dad are going to the beach and I can take a friend. Do you want to go?" Josh thinking this could be a way out of Bri's life eagerly agreed. "Great, we will be by in about a half an hour to come and get you. Don't forget your bathing suit and pajamas."

"Pajamas?" Josh asked sounding a little perplexed.

"Yeah, we're staying the night at our beach house and will be back tomorrow night." Katie responded back to him. "Geeze, you're such a space cadet today."

"Yeah, I'm not feeling like myself today." Josh replied back to her causing to giggle some more.

"Well we'll be by soon, so go get ready." Katie demanded as she hung up the phone.

"What did she want?" Bri wondered as she watched Josh hang up the phone on his end.

Acting nonchalantly he answered. "Oh, we're just going to her beach house tonight."
112322121322.title: Josh gets a phone call.

choices: Courtney, who came from the mall after shopping with friends

Acting nonchalantly he answered. "Oh, we're just going to her beach house tonight."

"You are?" She asked. "I wish I could go."

"Do you want to swap back then?"

"No it's fine, you go and be me." Josh could tell she really wanted to go though.

"Your not a great lair Bri, I can tell you want to go." Bri didn't respond or make eye contact. "I'll tell ya what, let's swap back both our lives and clothes. We can be our normal selves until you get back tomorrow night, then we can make more swaps." She finally looked at Josh again. "Do we have a deal?"

"Okay, it's a deal!" She said.

Josh and Bri eventually swapped their lives and clothes back, and they were completely back to normal. Since Kim was still busy, Josh helped his youngest sister pack, and made sure her departure went smoothly. After she left, Josh continued to watch TV on the couch, the rain had lightened up a bit but there was still a drizzle. After another half an hour passed, Josh heard the doorbell ring, he got up and made his way over to answer the door to _____.
1123221213221.title: Bri wants to swap back and go

choices: In the Car:  Josh let's it slip about his new gift.

1123221213222.content:
Acting nonchalantly he answered. "Oh, we're just going to her beach house tonight." He watched in disbelief as her face didn't change at all like he was expecting. "What?" He asked with wonderment. "Don't you want to go?"

"No, I've been there 5 or 6 times last summer so it's nothing too big." She yawned as she began to stretch out a little more to make herself more comfortable while watching one of her favorite television shows. "It's always the same thing." She held up her fingers to show what she meant and held out her first finger. "First you will go swimming in the ocean." She then held out the other finger. "Then you will go inside and have dinner and watch a movie." Holding up a third finger she finished. "Then you will play truth or dare. It's the same every time."

Josh knew that his plan had back fired and he was standing there like an idiot. "Come on, Bri." Josh begged as he pushed her leg to get her attention. "Please go?"

"Nope, sorry." Bri replied with a huge grin on her face. "Besides, you're Bri now not me and you need to go and get packed."

"Fine, but you owe me big." He threatened as he made his way up to his room that he now shared with Bri and started to go through his new clothes to find something to wear. Begrudginly, he looked in his drawers and pulled out his new underwear and tossed them onto the bed. Opening the other drawers, he was able to find a couple bathing suits, now resized to fit him. He looked at the both of them and decided to choose the blue and white tankini   over the bikini cut that was in his left hand. "At least this will somewhat cover more of my body." Soon he had all the clothes that he wanted to bring and put it in his backpack. As he was going down the stairs, he heard the doorbell ring and knew that his hell was about to begin.
1123221213222.title: Bri's getting bored of that place and lets ...

choices: They soon arrive at the beach.
11232212132221.content:
10 minutes had passed since Katie met Josh at the door. She seemed pleased to have her friend able to stay with her and have the fun that they always did. But when they got in the car, Katie seemed to pick up that something was wrong with her friend. As she turned to her, Katie noticed that 'Bri' was looking down at her own clothing with a sense of disgust. She drew her head closer to her friend and whispered. "What's the matter?"

Josh turned his head, grateful that his shorter hair was back on his head. "Oh, it's nothing." Josh lied as he faked a smile. Josh looked back out the window, to see the changing landscape go by as they passed.

"So." Katie replied as she tried her best to get her friend's attention again. "What was up with your brother today?" She chuckled at the thought of it all.

Josh, not really knowing what was going on, immediately said what first came to mind. "Yeah, she's really been a thorn in my side since we swapped lives." As soon as it came out, Josh regretted it and instantly brought his hands up to his mouth to reduce anything else came out. "Umm.... I mean HE'S been a thorn in my side." He corrected himself as he looked over at Katie's half-asian face to see if she bought it.

"What?" Katie asked with great expression. "Wait, what did you say?"

Josh knowing that he'd been caught, tried desperately to correct it. "I said he's been a thorn in my side since we swapped chores." He quickly thought of what to say and thought that chores sounded good.

He watched in horror as Katie shook her head in defiance. "No, you said you swapped lives." She let out a small audible gasp as she finally got what was going on. "That would make sense." She replied as she brought her hands back up to her mouth and thought about it for a moment.

"No, he had to take over my chores, since I came here with you." Josh lied, desperately trying to cover his tracks.

choices: Later on, they have fun in at the beach.

Katie is sneaky and succeeds in getting something.
112322121322211.content:
"I still think you're pulling my leg." Katie replied defiantly as she tried to look the part, but seemed to fail miserably as she smiled her broad smile and leaned in closer to her 'friend'. "Tell me everything." Was all that seemed to escape her lips as she whispered the phrase into his ear, as not to let her Mom to hear her. Katie's mom had grown up in rural Japan. Growing up there, she certainly was superstitious and must have heard stories of mysterious creatures that roamed the countryside.

Josh debated on whether or not he should tell Bri's friend what was going on, but decided to leave some of the details out. He decided to leave out one of the more important parts; the part where they both have to agree for anything to happen. "And before I knew it, you called for Bri and I came along with you."

"Wow, that really is awesome." Katie replied as she looked out the window so that she could get a read at where they were. "So let's say... um" She waited for a moment so that she could think of something. "Oh, let's say if we wanted to swap heights with you."

Josh was a little taken aback at what was just asked. He looked over at her and noticed that she was about the same height of his sister, but didn't really want to do it. He shook his head as the thought of everything that would happen if he had to deal with this for however amount of time. "I'm sorry, but no." Even though he swapped lives with his sister, he really didn't want to do anything else until he got home.

"Awe." Katie said dejectedly. "But we will have all of our normal stuff to do when we get there and I'm sure we can talk about it later on." She looked over to at Josh and seemed to think of him as her friend that have been together ever since the first grade.
112322121322211.title: Katie doesn't believe him.

choices: Josh tries to find an excuse not to go to the beach.
Josh allows Katie to request one swap.
1123221213222112.content:
After several hours, the car they were riding in finally made it to their destination. Josh looked out of the window and noticed that their wasn't a crowded parking lot, but instead a house on stilts overlooking the ocean. "Alright girls we're here." Sgt. Taylor replied as he opened the door. When the door opened, Josh could smell the faint scent of the ocean and hear the gentle crashing of the waves. The last time he'd been to the ocean was when he was little and it was with his Dad. With the sound of the seagulls, a tear began to form in his eye. Not wanting Katie or her family to see it, Josh quickly wiped it from his face.

"Let's go." Katie whispered to Josh as she opened her own door to lead to the beach house.

"Here, let me open the trunk for you." Katie's dad replied as he bent over to hit the switch and an audible 'POP' could be heard as the trunk opened up.

"Umm... Thanks." Josh said as he reached into the trunk and pulled out the girly looking backpack from the storage space and followed Bri's friend up the stairs to the home. With each step that he took, Josh was in awe at the size and beauty of the home. With two stories and being on stilts to help protect it from any nasty storms, the house seemed massive.

"Nice, huh?" Katie asked as she motioned for Josh to follow her. "Come on, let's go up to my room."

"Don't get too much stuff out." Keiko said to the both of them. "We will be leaving for the beach in a bit, so go and switch into your swim suits."

"Okay, mom." Katie replied back as she grabbed Josh's arm to help drag him up to her room.

"But..." Josh started to stammer, but was cut off by Katie.

"Let's go, BRI." Taking extra effort to emphasize his new name. "We don't have a lot of time."
1123221213222112.title: Katie wants to try to swap something else.

While changing into swimwear, Katie started talking to Bri,

"Come on let me chose what we swap, if you even have that ability" Katie stated.

"Well the real Bri would".

"But I'm not the real Bri"

"Then you owe me a swap then".

"Hey-"

"Let me Finish, and rather than make this weekend more interesting and keeping us more entertained you are going to keep this ability to yourself".


Josh felt a ping of guilt, it wasn't right that Katie had to suffer through this, and who knows, this might be fun.

"fine 1 swap, but it has to be just this weekend, nothing longer". Bri stated

11232212132221123.title: Josh allows Katie to request one swap.

112322121322211231.content:
"Ok but before I agree I want to know why" Josh stated in Bri's body

"Oh my family just treats guests better than family, if you were actually Bri you would know this, but My mom always states that we should treat the guest first and make them happy." Katie stated.

"Ok but what does that entail?"

"ok for example last time Bri and I came out here I wanted Sushi and Bri wanted hot dogs, and our family got hot dogs. and When it was movies or the beach, Bri got to pick the movies. Also just some other little things that guest order first and that if we have guests around we should get them what they want".

With that a Flash happened and Josh was standing where Katie just was, but something was off about Katie, her eyes, they looked... European, and her skin looked paler. Then the new Katie got an excited look on her face.

"Bri, Josh, whatever you are you have to take a look in the mirror". and with that the new pale Katie pushed Josh in-front of a mirror and what he saw puzzled him for a bit. Instead of his brown hair sister, there was a blacked hair girl in the mirror that was him. but the hair style and clothes hadn't changed. It was almost if Bri had a half asian sister and now he was that girl.

Katie just looked in the mirror with amazement, "wow this is so cool, I know you only said 1 swap but if we could do more than I am so down for it".

With that "Katies mom" came up the stairs

Josh winced as Katie just had a mixture of Amazement and laughter on her Face

and with the swimsuits on and smiles on both faces, Josh and Katie started running to the car to go to the beach, with Josh narrowly winning at the end, but Josh's victory was short lived as he heard Katie's Mom "Bri were you racing up to the car to let our guest pick the seat".

The thoughts of "Just a weekend played in the back of Joshes mind".
112322121322211231.title: Switch Families

choices: Katie wants to do some swaps while swimming
Time for a game or two.
112322121322211232.content:
Josh sat there waiting for Katie to choose something and hoping that it wouldn't be something too bad. She still believed that he'd always been Bri and her friend. If it wasn't for the little slip up in the car, she would still believe that. He waited for Katie to choose what she wanted. It seemed to be like an eternity until she finally spoke up. "Bri, I think I know what I want to get from you." She replied with a smile on her face. She was jumping up and down with excitement when she figured out what she wanted. "I want to swap out clothes. I've always liked your clothes and wanted to try them on, but since you're too big, they won't fit me right."

"Why that?" Josh wondered, but trying not to dissuade her from choosing something much more menacing. "I thought you liked your clothes." He lied, not really knowing if she liked them or hated them.

"I do like my clothes, but I've always wanted to try your on." Katie clarified. "And I like the bathing suit that you're wearing." She gestured to the blue and white tankini that he was now wearing.

"This thing?" He asked as he looked down at the all too revealing clothing that he was wearing and wished that he could get out of it and into his own swim trunks.

"Yeah, please?" Katie pleaded as she brought her hands together in an attempt to get something from him. Josh thought about it for a minute and decided that it couldn't be worse that what he would be wearing in the first place.

To make matters worse, he got somewhat tricked as he would get his Bri's longer hair flipped right back to him. He would basically be his 8 year old sister from a physical standpoint.

"Can I ask why you want to do that?" He asked her.

"No questions, you HAVE to do the swap. I said that!"

That did enough for him as he was able to tell the swap worked. He looked around and everything now seemed gigantic to him. He now has small arms, legs, hands, feet and a flatness his crotch area. Bri didn't see what her brother was going through as she was looking at her new situation, which was the opposite of Josh's. Feeling a new discomfort with her clothes, which were resized to fit her bigger body, her first words with her new voice were. "I can see why you want to give my clothes back so badly." She was trying to adjust her panties to give her new junk some room, with no avail. She was also surprised by her new voice at first, but she kind of liked it.

"So... when can we swap back?" Josh asked, still getting used to his girly voice.

"I want to be able to keep it for longer than your clothes and hair. Can I give it back by Sunday before school."

"Monday doesn't sound so bad." Josh thought. "The weekend is fine by me."

"I want to see what being a boy and being bigger than the other kids is like at school." She explained with her new deeper voice, intrigued by the sound.

"Joshie?" Josh heard his sister ask behind him. "Can we swap underwear too?" She said while adjusting her panties which her tight on her unfamiliar male junk.

It's actually even longer than a week." When he got to the bottom of the steps, he saw his PlayStation hooked up to the living room TV. Josh decided he had gone through enough swapping with his sisters. "Sorry Bri, but I think I've gone though enough swapping for today."

"Pretty please?" She said, she got on her knees to beg.

"Not today, at least." Josh told her, starting to walk out.

"Fine. But don't expect your hair and clothes back tomorrow night if you still won't swap anything else!" She threatened.

This comment sort of caught his attention, but after thinking about it he realized that was more than 24 hours away. By then, she would want her hair or clothes back, and/or Josh would come around to another swap by then anyway.

Josh went down the stairs and couldn't really find anything to do. After a few minutes of hiding out from his younger sisters downstairs, he felt his phone buzz in his pocket. He saw that he received a text message from somebody:

"Hey Josh, I'm about to leave my house and I'll be on my way."- Jenn

The last few hours had made Josh forget that Jenn was coming over! He needed to avoid his sisters to avoid swapping anything else though, so he thought of a plan, and sent a text message to his friend:

"On second thought, may I come over to your place by a chance? Things are a bit hectic around here."

Within half a minute, Josh got his response and saving grace for the day:

"Sure, no problem! See you soon."

With that, Josh called to his mom that he was heading over to Jenn's house, but then he realized something. He couldn't let Jenn see him with his new hair and clothes! He was about to cancel the visit, but then he realized that when Courtney found out Josh made a swap with Bri, she asked him what it was, not knowing until he told her. He thought maybe she wouldn't notice like his sister, and he decided to risk it, considering he wanted to avoid his sister and had no other options. He went to grab his book bag just in case Jenn wanted to study, but when he picked it up, his bag was much lighter. But then it hit Josh, as he put down his black bag and picked up Bri's Minnie Mouse bag, which was the correct weight, and headed out.

When he got to Jenn's place after a 10 minute walk, he rang the doorbell and was answered by her mom, "Hey there Mrs. Marshall!" Josh greeted.

"Hello Josh, Jenn is upstairs." Josh realized she treated him the same as always and didn't acknowledge his new hair or clothes.

Josh headed up the stairs with his new book bag, and saw Jenn's sister Kira making her way down the stairs. "Oh hey Josh! I didn't know you were coming over, I didn't know why you weren't on PlayStation." She told him.

"Yeah your sister invited me over" He told her, noticing that she also treated him like normal.

When he got to his friend's room, he knocked which was answered with a quick "come in."

Josh opened the door and then walked in, placing his Minnie Mouse bag next to her bed and shut the door behind him. "Hey Jenn." He greeted.

"Hey, you don't sound very enthusiastic." She told him.

"It's my sisters, they've been bugging me ever since I got home." He told her.

"Tell me about it!" She said. "Kira's been complaining all afternoon because you weren't on PlayStation with her."

"I just wanted to get out of the house." Josh explained.

"Okay so, what do you want to do?" She asked.

113.content:
Once he reached his room, Josh quickly swapped his soaking wet clothes out for a cleaner, drier set. He immediately got started with his biology homework since he wanted to know what Jenn was talking about if she did in fact come over later to study. Josh figured he was in the clear after 5 minutes, but was still a bit embarrassed and wanted to refrain from telling his odd story.

Josh was making progress on his work when he heard a knock on his door. "Come in!" He called, hoping the person about to enter had a different topic to touch on other than his untimely and unconventional arrival. He stayed focused on his work but immediately knew who had walked in.

"There you are Joshua." His mother said using his real name, which she did every once in awhile.

Josh immediately started to get nervous. "Hey mom, home from work early?"

"Yes I am. I just came to ask though," she took a seat on his bed. "Are you doing okay? You didn't even greet me or either of your sisters when I heard you walk in, and Brianna said you were dripping wet."

Realizing he was caught, he just decided to tell the truth. "Yeah, I missed the bus and got caught in the rain."


"Well, make sure to be faster so you can get to the bus next time. I don't want you walking out alone like that, especially in this type of water." She said with the overprotective mother in her kicking in. "What about your umbrella? I thought I told you to take it to school before you left this morning."

Josh couldn't think of an excuse, so he just told his mom most of the truth. He took a seat next to her explained how he had met the old woman at the bus stop and took sympathy for her and her situation, he stopped at giving her the umbrella though and made no mention of the power.

"That's good, I'm proud of you for that." Kim praised her son.

"Really? Your not mad?"

"How could I be mad?" She questioned. "Those are the type of kind deeds and respect that I try to instill in you kids." She continued, giving her son a light pat on the back. "Sadly, you do a better job than the others."

"Why, what's wrong?" Josh asked concerned.

"Your sisters have been talking back more lately. Courtney had an attitude because I refused to drive her and her friends to the mall. Then Bri got angry because I wanted her to start some of her homework since she has a game each of the two days this weekend."

"That stinks."

"Well, it's part of being a mother."

"I guess so."

"And I wouldn't trade it for the world. Although I could use a day or two off." She said jokingly.

"Trust me mom, I would gladly take your place if it meant you had some time off." He said. What happened next after that surprised Josh. A bright flash occupied his room for a very brief moment, which also left his mother with a very surprised look on her face.

"What happened?" She asked.

"I'm not sure." Josh said, as he was very confused himself.

Seeing as nothing appeared to be different, the mother and son duo decided to ignore it. That was, until another visitor entered the room. "Mom, are you in here?" Bri opened the door. "There you are. Do you know where my soccer jersey is?" She asked, but weirdly looking straight at Josh.

"It's hanging up in the laundry room downstairs." Their mother answered.

"Alright..." Bri replied with a look of confusion. "Thanks Kim."

Her mother didn't seem to like the fact that her daughter by her first name. "Excuse me young lady, I am your mother. You should show me some respect and not call me that!"

"What do you mean? You're my big brother." She replied not understanding. "Why are you acting so weird?"

"Quit it with the nonsense Brianna! I am your mother and you WILL show me some respect!"

What the youngest in the family did next was surprising. She approached Josh and grabbed him tightly, almost as if he was being used as protection. "What's Kim talking about mom? She questioned with a look of fear in her eye. "I'm scared."

"Uhhh..." Was all Josh could let out.

Luckily, Bri spoke up before her 'brother' could yell at her again. "Are you okay mom?" She inquired with her eyes on Josh.

"Umm... could you give us a second?" He asked Bri, finally making a realization.

"Sure." She replied before dashing out of the room and closing the door behind her.

"Care to explain Joshua?" His mother asked with her arms folded.

"There MIGHT have been a part I left out about my story earlier." He went on to explain this supposed power, that he was still having a hard time believing he actually had. "I think when I said I would gladly take your place for a couple of days, we swapped places in the family tree. That means I'm the mother and you're the oldest son."

"That's impossible." Was all she could respond with. Kim had never been a big believer in magic, even during her younger years.

"You have a more logical explanation?"

"Fine, I guess that flash was enough proof anyway." She gave in, still with a chunk of denial hiding within.

"So, should we swap back then? Josh proposed.

"Actually not yet." His mom said with a smile.

"Wait, what?" He asked surprised.

"Well, I said I wanted a couple of days off. I meant it."

"But I don't know how to be a mother!" Her son argued.

"Consider it a learning experience. You can see what it's like to go through what I do and we can learn more about your, well I guess my siblings and see them in a different light."

"Alright, let's do it then." He agreed. "But we'll swap back Sunday night."

"Okay then, see you around MOM!" Kim said laughing before she left. Josh was actually kind of glad, he hadn't seen her so happy in a long time.
